Luxury Living in this East Williamsburg Penthouse!!! This stunning duplex condo features double height ceilings and oversized 12 foot windows, filling this loft with sunlight. Entertain on either of your TWO private outdoor spaces: a balcony the width of the apartment, or an upper roofdeck with spectacular skyline views. Spread across 2 levels, Penthouse B offers a spacious 956 interior square feet, with an additional 525 exterior feet of terraces accessed by double paned custom glass floor to ceiling doors. Designed to pair old and new, reclaimed and exposed brick pairs perfectly with the stunning open plan kitchen, custom steel staircase, and breathtaking marble bathroom. Pet friendly building. Well worth the walk up (this is a Non-Elevator building)!!Just off Graham Avenue, you will find Brooklyn's best restaurants, shops, and transportation just outside your door. In addition, McCarren Park is around the corner, offering a swimming pool, soccer, basketball, baseball, tennis, and summer films. Email or call me for a private showing.

PRICE REDUCTION: Four story townhouse near vibrant Lenox Ave. Light and bright! Fully renovated. This lovely single family home offers the best of townhouse living. Four large bedrooms with windows galore. Four full baths and a powder room - all tastefully tiled, including a large marble master bath. And more - Walk out onto your deck from the sleek kitchen, open dining and living room. This house offers an abundance of outdoor space. Additionally, the garden level family room leads out to the patio and fenced yard. And, the top floor sitting room leads up to the roof via a gracious staircase. Downtown views. Air rights to build up. All new systems, full cellar, central air and washer/dryer. Beautiful, bright and thoughtfully laid out. A Must See townhouse on a charming tree lined block.

Well maintained home located near beach. Sited on .35 acre heated pool, spa, outdoor shower, deck for entertaining. Home features soaring ceilings in great room, light filled with hardwood floors, fireplace custom lighting, built ins. Eat in kitchen, 4 bedrooms 3.5 baths. Enjoy home theater, wine cellar, entertaining areas lower level.

Welcome Home! After a day of conquering Manhattan, arriving home to this pin-drop quiet beauty will be a delight in every way. This one bedroom is a lovely space with a stylish character uniquely its own. The perfectly planned one bedroom CONDO is a serene, bright residence in the heart of the Upper West Side. Entertaining is seamless in this inviting living room which enjoys the view of an enchanting prosperity fountain and leafy green foliage beneath your window. The kitchen with its slate floor, custom cabinetry with glass doors, stainless steel appliances and granite counter space is perfect for bringing out your inner chef! The adjacent dining area comfortably seats 4-6. Relax and unwind in the tranquil bedroom while listening to soothing water trickling from the water feature beneath. An ensuite bathroom includes a large dressing room complete with custom storage and shelving. A welcoming foyer with incredible closet space, crown and base moldings, and gleaming wood floors complete this special residence. The Dorchester Towers, a full service luxury building enjoys a beautifully landscaped circular driveway, 24 hour doorman and concierge, supremely attentive live in resident manager, beautifully renovated lobby, planted roof deck, fitness center, conference center and bike room. Walk to Trader Joe's, 1, 2, 3 subways and buses, shops and terrific restaurants. Laundry is conveniently located on each floor. Great INVESTMENT opportunity too with flexible sublease. Walk to Lincoln Center, Central Park and Riverside Park too!

South facing Upper West Side condominium. This one bedroom home is located in a full service building that is in close proximity to Lincoln Center, Central Park, multiple subway lines and some of the finest shopping and restaurants on the UWS. The living room and bedroom receive nice South facing light and offer views of the landscaping of W 68th St. There is ample closet space and a separate kitchen that can easily become your ideal chefs kitchen. This apt is in good condition and is priced to sell. There is an ongoing assessment of $111.22 for this unit.Dorchester Towers is a full service building with full time doormen, live in super, storage, roof deck, parking, laundry on each floor, and a bike room.

Unbeatable price and seller paying six months of maintenance for buyer!! It's time to make offers!

The Essex House is an iconic New York hotel / condo situated directly across from Central Park on Central Park South. This bright and large one bedroom apartment perched on the 31st floor is located in the coveted tower of the hotel. Its placement on a high floor allows abundant sunlight all day from its seven south-facing windows.

When you enter this apartment, you immediately notice the sunlight that pours in through the south-facing windows. The foyer leads to the living/dining area that features two walk-in closets and then enters into the large living space with an adjoining, windowed kitchen. The generously sized bedroom, features a large closet, and an en suite bathroom with soaking tub. This apartment also features original herringbone floors, dental crown molding, central heat/air, and overhead lighting.

Calling the Essex House home comes with many benefits. Surrounded by amazing shops, restaurants, and entertainment within Columbus Circle and Lincoln Square, and the very special Central Park. As a resident, you have access to all of the amenities of the hotel including valet laundry, dry cleaning, room service, maid's service, and a full time concierge team for condominium owners. Additionally, there is a health club, event space, and restaurant. The Essex House condominiums may be used as investments and be rented for minimum 1 month terms, with no board approval required.

Featuring 1,600 square feet of outdoor space split between a brand new roof deck and backyard, we invite you to the elevator townhouse, a brownstone originally built in 1910 and reimagined in 2017.The residence encompasses 6,900 square feet over 6 livable floors with 6 oversized bedrooms, en-suite marble baths with radiant heat, and walk-in closets in each. There are 2 wood burning fireplaces, steam room and an entertainment level wet bar.The generous proportions and design have an organized elegance that you might not find elsewhere. Incredibly high ceilings, and new windows with the original window shutters frame each bedroom. On the top floor, we have added a wall of southern windows which has a protected view, and is a wonderful game room. The brand new fifth floor leads up to a new glass bulkhead with additional storage in the vestibule to the roof deck.The open Chef's Kitchen is splendid in all four seasons as light emanates from the backyard on the garden level. Featuring double Sub-Zero refrigerators, white kitchen island, and windowed cabinets. The Wolf range and ventilated hood has an Artistic tile backsplash. Featuring a Miele dishwasher, and a dual function speed convection oven / micro, the island also doubles as a countertop architecturally designed for a casual dining. A folding wall of windows is easy to open to create an outdoor feel when dining in your eat-in kitchen.The renovation added 2,200 square feet to this home adding depth and height. There is new plumbing, 18 zone heating, 4 zone central AC, new sprinklers, new windows, and nothing has been left without careful consideration.

A perfect West Side Story! Welcome Home to this lovely spacious alcove studio (convertible one bedroom) just steps away from Lincoln Center, Central Park, and Riverside Park. Perched up high on the 25th floor, this pin drop quiet and sunshine filled living room (with an adjacent dining area together with room for home office) is an ideal space boasting four gigantic picture windows framing gorgeous blue skies. The sleeping alcove with dressing area offers a custom Murphy Bed and built in storage. The renovated kitchen with ample custom cabinetry, beautiful onyx granite countertops and premium appliances is perfect for bringing out your inner chef! Spacious closets (including a walk-in) and gleaming wood floors complete this residence. Here, in this prime Lincoln Square location, 160 West End Avenue enjoys 24 hour doorman, supremely attentive super, gym, dry cleaning, play room, laundry, bike storage, and access to Lincoln Towers own perfectly private park. Pet friendly too. Low maintenance includes gas & electricity! Walk to 1,2,3 subways and buses, shops, and terrific restaurants. You too can have your own perfect West Side Story.
Great Walk In Spacious 2 Bedroom Apartment Condo! New Bright & Sunny Kitchen! Gated Adult Community With Full Time Security.

OPEN HOUSE IS BY APPOINTMENT ONLY!
PLEASE DO NOT JUST SHOW UP AT THE BUILDING!

This mint, 4 bedroom prewar condo conversion offers luxury living with original details.

The fabulous windowed kitchen is open to the formal dining room and offers custom cabinets, white glass countertops, marble back splash, and top-of-the-line appliances such as Miele, Bertazonni, Fischer Paykal, and Bosch. The 4 bedrooms have plenty of closet space, and the large sun-flooded living room and master bedroom both face South. The 3.5 windowed luxurious bathrooms are pristinely renovated with custom vanities, polished nickel hardware and a stunning combination of stone and glass. Additional features of this gorgeous home include central air conditioning, new windows, washer/dryer, wine cooler, sound system and new solid oak floors.

165 West 91st Street is a rare prewar condo that offers a full-time doorman, resident manager, a fabulous landscaped roof garden, fitness room, bike room, a kid's playroom, plus a meticulously restored lobby with new bronze doors and cold storage. The building is close to the 1, 2 and 3 subway lines and half way between Riverside Park and Central Park. Plenty of restaurants, supermarkets and stores are close by.

Triple mint Tribeca penthouse two bedroom condominium with two and a half baths, twenty-four doorman and working wood-burning fireplace. Towering over Duane Park with spectacular views from City Hall to the Empire State through massive eight foot tall windows, incredible light pours in throughout the day. Greet guests in your over-sized entry foyer and lead them into an enormous living area where they will be in awe of incredible ceiling heights and fantastic proportions. The expertly designed kitchen is perfect for entertaining in that its open while hiding meal preparation and clean up. Facing east, a comfortable master suite easily fits a king-sized bed. Two large walk-in closets provide plentiful storage. The master bath has a deep soaking tub, separate glass enclosed shower with rain shower head, custom vanity and separate water closet. The second bedroom is on the opposite side of the home and provides complete privacy with its own ensuite bath. 166 is a pet friendly boutique condominium with private roof deck for residents, full-time doorman and superintendent. Perfectly located right on historic Duane Park, acclaimed restaurants Forgione and Locanda Verde are but a couple of the neighborhood stapes. Whole Foods, The World Trade Center, Oculus and Brookfield Place are minutes from your front door. The 1/2 and 3 trains are right downstairs while the A/C/E/N/R/4/5/6 are reached easily.

Situated in one of NYC's finest luxury buildings this 1400 SF 2 bedroom 2.5 bath has endless possibilities. Upon entering the unit you find yourself in a wide foyer leading to a large living and separate dining space. A wall of windows, and southern exposure provides plenty of sunshine throughout. There is an abundance of closet space, in unit washer/dryer permitted and each bedroom has it's own en suite bath. With a little TLC this is your chance to own in one the city's most exciting neighborhoods! You are only minutes away from the best shopping, dining and entertainment.

Building amenities include fulltime attended lobby, garage parking, gym, and outdoor garden.*NOTE! Building no longer has a land lease!!

Truly special Fieldstone Colonial situated on a quiet cul-de-sac on New Rochelle/Larchmont border in sought-after location less than one mile to Metro-North, shops and restaurants. Gracious home elegantly renovated with a keen eye to preserving its original details and 1930s character. Inviting, freshly painted interior highlighted by hardwood floors, classic millwork, and sunny exposures. Main living areas include large living room with brick fireplace and built-ins; enclosed porch sliders to private yard; formal dining room; and a spacious eat-in-kitchen with granite counters, stainless steel appliances, center island, and adjoining breakfast/family room. Second floor provides wonderful master suite with copious closets, master bath, two additional bedrooms and hall bath, PLUS guest bedroom and full bath on FIRST LEVEL. Lower level offers recreation room fireplace, playroom, powder room, utility room, laundry room with walk-out to property. Taxes do not include Basic Star. Motivated!

Stunning Four Bedroom Condominium - Ideal for Entertaining

Enjoy an ambience of luxury and mid-century design flair in this large, airy and loft-like 4BR / 4BA apartment located at the handsome Diamond House, a full-service mid-rise condominium on East 77th Street between Lexington and Third Avenues. Immediate proximity of finest dining and boutiques, world-class museums and schools, as well as two subway lines, a cross-town bus and Central Park make it an ideal location, and a rare opportunity to enjoy the best combination of what downtown open-space loft apartments and Upper East Side neighborhood lifestyle can offer.

Upon entering, be dazzled by the impressive open living space that offers distinctive architectural elements and flows seamlessly for entertaining. Open city views are yours to savor through large picture windows and 4 exposures invite in a generosity of glorious sunlight throughout the day. Host memorable dinner parties and impress your guests in the tremendous open 26'-long double living room and enjoy the spacious formal dining area for sit-down meals. All main rooms have gorgeous dark solid oak stripped hardwood flooring, and beautiful high beamed ceilings.

The partially open Bulthaup kitchen has all the chef desires. Brightened by a sunny window, it offers amazing pantry and cabinet space, and is equipped with top of the line built-in Gaggenau cooktop, Thermador double-oven and Sub-Zero fridge and wine cabinet, all in stainless steel. A spacious breakfast area provides a convenient spot for more casual coffee and evening fare.

The master bedroom in the 2 bedrooms' east wing benefits from great light with double exposure and is complemented by a wall of fabulous closets. The spa-style en-suite bathroom presents a double vanity, a deep soaking tub and a huge glass shower for relaxation. The 2 western bedrooms and full baths are equally bright, elegant and comfortable. The bedroom adjacent to the living room has a large sliding wall that can open to convert the space into a den, office or media room, adding square footage to the entertainment area and taking advantage of the versatile space. The apartment could easily become a lavish 3 bedroom, 4 bathroom home.

Refined finishes, a state-of-the-art built-in sound system, and convenient in-home washer and dryer add to the allure.

The 11-story Diamond House is a triple-mint, full-service luxury condominium with white-glove amenities that include a gorgeous renovated lobby, full-time doorman, live-in super, private sky-lit exercise room and stunning landscaped rooftop deck.

Assessment $282

PETS ALLOWED

INCREDIBLE PENTHOUSE DUPLEX CONDO WITH THREE TERRACES! Bask in the breathtaking cityscape from this one of a kind sun splashed 3 bedroom, 2.5 bath duplex offering THREE TERRACES perched up high on the 21st and 22nd floors in the heart of the Upper East Side totaling almost 2350 sq. feet. Enter this beautiful oasis in the sky through an entryway (perfect space to display art) that leads you to a bright, spacious and inviting living room, ideal for relaxation or seamless entertaining. Relish in the warm glow of the setting sun while sipping cocktails or dining alfresco on your enormous 400 sq. ft. terrace, plenty of room for two seating areas and your own rooftop herb garden. Even the kitchen has a view through its oversized window and enjoys ample countertops and cabinets galore, perfect for bringing out your inner chef! An additional windowed powder room completes this level and ensures easy entertaining. Upstairs, the tranquil master suite boasts a huge walk in closet and TWO private terraces with unobstructed open sky on the northern intimate terrace (perfect to enjoy your morning coffee) or relax and unwind under the stars illuminating the night sky on your private 400 sq. foot southern terrace. The Zen inspired bath indulges you with a deep soaking tub and separate shower. The second bedroom (ideal for a library or home office) is equally inviting boasting access to the southern terrace as well. A third spacious bedroom also enjoys these incredible unique north and south exposures. Glorious light, gleaming hardwood herringbone floors, granite bathrooms, large closets and a washer dryer complete this incredible residence. The Gotham Condo is ideally located in the heart of Carnegie Hill, one of Manhattan's most desirable neighborhoods. Desirably situated just off Lexington Avenue, Penthouse 21B is the extraordinary embodiment of sleek, innovative, and unique design. Exclusive amenities include: 24-hour doorman and concierge, supremely attentive super, a fully-equipped fitness center, 80 foot heated pool and sauna, children's playroom, party room with full catering kitchen, outdoor garden, and a bike room. Walk to Whole Foods and Fairway, subways (4,5,6 and Q), buses, restaurants and shopping. The building allows investors, Pied-a-terres, co-purchasing, gifting, sublets. Luxury living at its finest.Please tour this special property by clicking on the following:https://h5property.com/tour/listings/DE2871828/h5tour.html

Extraordinary 3,147 SF residence at 170 East End Avenue with four bedrooms, study, and four and a half bathrooms. Floor-through plan with North and South exposures through floor-to-ceiling windows and nearly 24' x 28' living and dining room. The windowed eat-in kitchen features appliances by Sub-Zero, Wolf, and Miele, Swiss quartzite countertops, and cabinetry by Peter Marino. The two master bedroom suites both feature a five-fixture master bathroom finished in polished Italian Perlino Bianco marble with Dornbracht fittings, 6-foot soaking tub, and separate shower. Other features include multiple walk-in closets, rift-cut white oak parquet floors, and a separate service entrance with mud room.

Designed by world-renowned architect Peter Marino, 170 East End Avenue is a luxury condominium bordering Carl Schurz Park in the Upper East Side. Services include 24-hour concierge, doorman, and resident manager. Over 12,000 square feet of amenities including state-of-the-art fitness center, Pilates studio, yoga studio, squash court, golf simulator, playroom, screening room, arcade game room, billiards room, and cerused oak paneled library. Other features include landscaped courtyard with waterfall and on-site garage.

Unit 3B is a Brand New Three Bedroom/Two Bathroom 1472 SqFt Residence. Amazing 50 feet wide, it has spectacular Floor-to-Ceiling West Facing Windows. Gracious and airy, this home offers an enormous dining and entertaining space which is seamlessly integrated with an open kitchen.

This residence features:
- large 110 SqFt balcony off the living room
- wide plank flooring
- stainless steel Samsung appliances, vented laundry room
- spacious bathrooms with European Grohe fixtures
- separate climate control for each room
- four large closets, one walk-in

Also included in the purchase price additional storage in the building.

Expansive common roof terrace and a bike room are included in the building amenities.

This newly developed boutique condominium is conveniently located in close proximity to wonderful dining and shopping options, it's just a few steps from the express subway stop providing excellent transportation.

ATTENTION ALL TERRACE LOVERS! 1st offering in over 50 years of this expansive 2bedroom/2bath home with a spectacular 375 SF terrace. Located on a high floor of a premier Coop building West of Third Avenue, Apt. 16E welcomes you into a gracious entry foyer leading to a sun filled grand living room. A glass door opens to the East facing private terrace with lovely city views. The flowing layout consists of 2 separate bedroom wings with many walk in closets. The large Master bedroom faces East with an en-suite bath room. The equally large 2nd bedroom enjoys a Western city view. A 2nd bath is ideally located in the corridor outside this bedroom, making it easily accessible for guests. The windowed kitchen is a blank canvas for you to customize to meet your own personal needs. Washer/ dryers are allowed with Board approval. With a little creativity, this rare terraced residence can be transformed into your dream home!

174 East 74th Street is situated on a lovely tree lined street, West of Third Avenue. It features a 24 hour Doorman, live in Supt., handyman, laundry room, bicycle storage, storage room and a small garage. It is close to all transportation, including the Lexington Ave. subway, new Second Ave. subway and cross town buses. There are many fine restaurants, great shopping, and public and private schools nearby. It is in close proximity to Central Park.

One small dog up to 18" tall is allowed. Subletting is not permitted. There is a monthly assessment of $445. through Dec. 2017.

Perfect 5 Bed, 2 Bath Colonial In Levittown For $469,000. Open Floor Plan W/ Granite Eik & Stainless Steel Appliances, Den W/ Vaulted Ceilings, Huge 51X131 Yard W/ New Patio! Heating System Relocated, Separate Laundry Room, Huge Master Bedroom & More! A Great Midblock Location! This Home Is In Mint Condition, Has Been Freshly Painted & Is Waiting For A New Owner.

Your search is over! Unit 9D is spacious and immaculate 3 Bedroom + home office(Conv. to 4th BR)/3.5 Bathroom home perfectly situated on the corner of 3Rd Ave. and 62nd Street. Boasting over 2,300 square feet of sun drenched living space, this stunning residence is truly a HOME! Enter through a grand foyer leading you to a south-facing living room and den with tons of natural light. Opposite to the living room, you will find a functionally designed formal Dining Room with easy access to the kitchen featuring top-of-the-line stainless steel appliances, plenty of counter & cabinet space and a Washer/Dryer. On a separate wing you'll find 2 bedrooms; a spacious master which hosts 2 large walk-in closets as well as a beautiful windowed en-suite bathroom and a 2nd bedroom with it's own en-suite bath. This home is in good move in condition but can be easily tweaked to personalize to your own taste and needs.
The Victorian is a full-service building with a 24-hour doorman, and laundry room. Unbeatable proximity to public transportation, just moments from 4/5/6/N/Q/R/F/M/E trains.
* Pictures are virtually staged. Please note alternate floorplan.

Rare sun-drenched corner split 2 bedroom 2 1/2 bathrooms in one of Chelsea's most esteemed buildings, on one of Chelsea's most desirable blocks. Set on the grounds of the General Theological Seminary--one of the city's most revered historic landmarks--the Chelsea Enclave truly encompasses the old and the new, the urban and the pastoral. The residence: a welcoming foyer leads to a gracious well-proportioned light-flooded living room with floor to ceiling windows facing South and East and an open chef's kitchen with state of luxury appliances and a gas stove with a fully vented hood, a wine cooler and a separate pantry. The cheerful South facing master suite with its adjoining sitting area has two large walk-in closets. The second bedroom has custom built -ins, which render its use doubly attractive as an office and a bedroom. Closets abound throughout. Designed by Alan Wanzenberg, this gracious home features natural materials like European white oak flooring and a custom-crafted kitchen with white oak cabinetry and water-brushed granite counter tops. The master bathroom has Italian stone slab surfaces and custom wood linen storage cabinets. In addition to the beautiful landscaped roof decks, the residents are free to enjoy the peace and tranquility of the of Seminary's Close. A true sanctuary.The building has a full-time doorman, concierge, and a live-in super.The building has an exercise room, a bike room, a children's play room and parking is available as well. Storage bin is sold separately.

Welcome to 1784 Dean St, an astounding 3-family town home nestled in the vibrant Crown Heights!

This immaculate 2,876 sqft home features modern finishes including hardwood flooring, stainless steel appliances, and abundance of closet space.

Second floor unit has an oversized front-facing living room with an open kitchen and a separate dining area, abundance of closet space, including two large walk-ins, two back-facing bedrooms and two full bathrooms.

Third floor unit offers spacious, sun-flooded living room with an open kitchen, three bedrooms and 2 full bathrooms.

Easily accessible to public transportation, with Utica Ave A,C Subway station just minutes away, and the B46 bus route which runs along Utica Ave and Malcolm X Blvd. Close to the neighborhood shopping and dining, to name a few favorites: Manny's, Peaches and Therapy Wine Bar.
Priced To Sell-"Elm" Unit-2 Bedroom-2.5 Bathrooms-1 Car Garage-1 Minute To Community Center/Pool/Tennis-Low Taxes/Common Fees-3 Village School District

Introducing 1790 Third Avenue, The Cereza! This brand new beautifully crafted boutique condominium with a collection of 52 units houses studios to 2 bedrooms . All of the residences were uniquely crafted with the highest quality materials and prudent attention to detail. Each home in The Cereza features: Floor to ceiling windows, wonderful views , 6-inch white oak hardwood floors, a washer/dryer, Caesarstone Calacatta Nuvo kitchen countertops with Bosch stainless steel appliances, Calacatta porcelain bathrooms with Duravit white gloss vanity with Grohe fixtures and Moen accessories. Truly rare, the park views from the building are unobstructed and protected making this a diamond in the rough. An absolute amazing investment opportunity with unparalleled price points for new developments in the city with low common charges and taxes.

Apartment 205 is an oversized, East-facing studio with a functional layout for comfortable living with views of the cherry trees of Cherry Tree Park across Third Avenue ? beautiful all year round, but a truly special treat in the spring when the trees are in full bloom.The Cereza Condominiums is nestled between parks and perfectly located between the Second Avenue and Lexington Avenue subway lines for ample transportation convenience. In addition, it provides easy accessibility to the finest in culture, dining and recreation. The silver facade introduces a prominent contemporary presence to the tree-lined New York City Avenue and a welcoming lobby entrance defined by warm tones and textures creating a peaceful transition away from the city streets. The building offers its residents a virtual doorman, a bike room, and a private rooftop terrace, which enjoys panoramic views of historic neighborhoods and canopy trees.

Gorgeous water view property with private deeded right of way to beautiful Shinnecock bay beach. Home boasts 3 bedrooms, 2 baths, open living room with fireplace and very high ceilings, large eat-in kitchen. Entire home surrounded by beautiful decking to enjoy the magnificent views.

Welcome to apartment #19 at 181 Thompson Street where The Greenwich Village meets Soho! Perched on the fourth floor, this charming two-bedroom offers a bright, quiet retreat. High ceilings, pass through windowed kitchen, crown molding, and windowed bathroom showcase this apartment's quaint features. Upon entering, one is delighted in the open kitchen with white exposed brick walls and wooden shelving. Through the kitchen's pass through window and into the living room the two large windows facing Thompson Street beam sunlight throughout the home. On your left you'll find both bedrooms creating an easy layout ? both bedrooms detailing exposed red brick, tons of sunlight and narrow plank hardwood flooring. The bathrooms with large windows bringing in natural light make this home extra special! Currently the only two-bedroom home under $1M in Greenwich Village, you don't want to miss it.

181 Thompson Street located in Greenwich Village embodies all the quintessential charm of this historic neighborhood. A six-story, walk-up building with intercom and part-time super. Dream location near Washington Square Park, all the winsome cafes and restaurants in Greenwich Village, and a short walk to shopping in Soho. Conveniently close to many subway lines. Co-op allows co-purchasing and guarantors. Best part, co-op allows for unlimited subletting from day one making this home perfect for an end-user or investor.

This beautifully renovated turnkey two bedroom is the best deal in Ditmas! Move right into this well-configured, rarely available garden level apartment and never carry your groceries far again as this apartment boasts a private exterior entrance. This corner unit features windows in every room with southern and eastern exposures which look out onto recently refurbished common green space. Be the first to break in the brand new hardwood floors that flow throughout. The bright living area flows into the eat-in kitchen which features custom-fit cabinets, stainless appliances including dishwasher, refrigerator, range/oven and hood, butcher block countertops, tile backsplash and floor. The amply sized bathroom with window sports all new subway tile, tub, sink and vanity and fixtures. Both bedrooms can accommodate a queen-size bed. The building has strong financials and an active board, a live-in super, full-time porters, package room, & part-time doorman, updated common courtyard and patio area, parking garage (fee), bike room, newly improved laundry down the hall from the unit, and a stylish updated lobby. Just two short blocks away from Newkirk Plaza (B/Q trains) and near local hangouts including Ox Cart and Milk and Honey on Newkirk Ave. Stroll three lovely sycamore-lined blocks down to Cortelyou Road where you'll find a year-round farmers market, shopping, and well known restaurants, bars, and cafes such as Mimi's Hummus, Café Madeleine, Lea, Qathra, and Purple Yam. Take a short bike ride via the neighborhood's bike lanes to Brooklyn's crown jewel outdoor space, Prospect Park with barbecue areas, the Lefrak Center at Lakeside, hiking and year-round festivals and green markets. Low monthly maintenance!

This stately, elegant 2 bed / 1 bath pre-war coop apartment is located in prime Brooklyn Heights, on the Brooklyn Heights promenade. Rarely available, with many pre-war details, 9 foot ceilings, hardwood floors, thoughtful built-ins and tons of character. The apartment's modern kitchen has custom cabinets and Bosch appliances, and the bathroom has also been recently renovated to perfection. The living room windows face out onto Columbia Heights, a picturesque, quiet, tree lined street. This 6 story, elevator building has a part-time doorman, storage, laundry room, and an amazing roof deck with panoramic views of New York Harbor and the Manhattan skyline. Close to the Pierrepont playground, Brooklyn Heights promenade, as well as fine dining, shopping, the A, C, R, 4,5 & 2,3 subways, and everything else that Brooklyn Heights has to offer. Dogs allowed w/ board approval.
Open and breezy. Waterviews, hot tub, extensive decking.

Full floor TriBeCa loft with direct elevator access in intimate six unit building is now yours to own. Million dollar gut renovation completed in 2016 by Habiterra and Mcgrath II with no detail overlooked and no expense spared. Three oversized bedrooms with ample custom closets in a thoughtful layout overlook 180 degree views of TriBeCa with Soho in your backyard. The master bathroom features radiant heat basket weave floors, Waterworks fixtures, rain shower, and deep soaking tub. Kitchen was custom built with brand new 36 inch Wolf range and integrated Sub Zero refrigerator, as well as Marvel wine fridge and Bosch dishwasher. A wood burning fire place centers the open living room flanked by floor to ceiling built-ins bringing warmth and tradition to this downtown loft. This "smart home" uses Crestron Pyng, allowing for remote control of UV blinds, Sonos system, and art gallery style lighting. Home office and laundry room complete the functional apartment that marries downtown cool with uptown size, scale, and quality. Access to 700 square foot common rooftop space with kitchen area and views of Lower Manhattan as well as additional private storage unit in the basement. This TriBeCa apartment exudes sophistication, warmth, and charm; it was featured by Architectural Digest in January 2017. Building is in process of being outfitted with video entry using Comelit technology.

This 1600 sq foot renovated 3 Bedroom 3 Bath apartment is located in the best Upper East Side location on a beautiful block. The apartment faces North and South and has excellent light throughout the day. The Master Bedroom is on one side of the apartment and the 2nd and 3rd bedrooms have their own private wing. This is a really wonderful layout for a family. The kitchen has been renovated and has a pass thru to the Living Room. The Living Room has built ins and faces 70th Street. There are 3 marble bathrooms and Washer/Dryer. The floors in all 3 Bedrooms have just been redone.The building has a Concierge and doorman, gym, entertainment room with kitchen and the largest children's playroom in the "Big Apple". You are steps from shops, restaurants and convenient transportation. Pet friendly building. There is general storage for suitcases.

The Sales Gallery is located at 180 Orchard Street on the ground floor.

This excellent 708 square foot design driven one-bedroom, one-bath condominium residence captures the evolution of contemporary bohemian chic, fusing character-rich interiors by Incorporated Architecture & Design. Features include finished exposed concrete ceilings and elegant wide white oak floors. Oversized industrial-style windows display East facing neighborhood views. The custom kitchen blends exceptional form and function with bleached European walnut millwork, onyx lacquer cabinetry and a polished Nero Marquina marble backsplash juxtaposed against a polished Zen Black quartz countertop. Fully integrated, state-of-the-art Miele appliances include a steam oven, refrigerator, dishwasher, wall oven and 4-burner cooktop, with an under-counter wine refrigerator, Franke garbage disposal, and Miele stacked washer/dryer. Luxurious bathroom finishes boast honed Blue De Savoie marble floors and wainscoting, polished Bianco Dolomiti marble shower, and a polished Bianco Specchio countertop with polished chrome Waterworks fixtures.

A two-story, 30,000-square-foot Equinox Fitness Center and Spa with a private entrance occupies the second and third floors. The building is crowned by a private residents-only 4,100-square-foot rooftop terrace with a sky lawn, cabana seating, two chef's tables, and two al fresco kitchens. Additional amenities include a 24-hour attended lobby, bicycle storage, and private storage available for purchase.

The Sales Gallery is located at 180 Orchard Street on the ground floor.

Be in the epicenter of downtown culture and experience life like a true New York maven in this full floor three bedroom, three bath Nolita home. 199 Mott is one of only 11 condos in this newly constructed LEED Silver Designated boutique doorman building.

Elegant, sophisticated and timeless, 199 Mott blends romantic historical references with the most state of the art systems, appliances and amenities. The home boasts an interior square footage of 2,907 square feet with an additional 1450 square feet of private outdoor space. Two guest bedrooms, one with an ensuite bathroom perfectly compliment the master suite opens to the private terrace and features a massive walk-in customized by California Closets. This home includes custom stained white oak floors, 10 inch base moldings, custom European oak doors and Daikin central air systems.

Steps to mass transit (6, N, R) and in the center of one of Manhattan's choice neighborhoods; 199 Mott is a 24 hour doorman building with concierge service and a landscaped rooftop terrace where you can soak up the sun and enjoy the panoramic views of lower Manhattan.

An ideal split bedroom layout, the second bedroom also enjoys river views, custom-designed encased bookshelves and an en-suite bathroom. Gleaming oak floors, large custom closets, recessed lighting, Sonos sound system throughout and a washer dryer complete this incredible residence.

There is a Gaggenau oven in the kitchen. The dining area has charming built-in cabinetry, as well as the living room. Off the dining area is a double glass door leading to the large planted terrace where one could put table and chairs. In the spacious master bedroom, there is a wall of windows and a door that also leads to the terrace. Closets are abundant throughout this gracious home, many of which are walk-in. The master bedroom has an ensuite bathroom. The apartment is filled with Northeastern light. On Billionaires' Row next to Whole Foods, Bloomingdales, Bloomberg Corporate HQ, great restaurants, all shopping and transportation to everyplace, The Carlton East is a perfect location. Amenities include 24 hour doorman, a resident manager, a central laundry facility, and a bike room. There is even a dentist in the commercial space of the Carlton East as well as BoConcepts Furniture Store, and Lillian Nassau antique lamps and art glass shop.

Welcome to 9J, one of the coveted corner residences with south and west exposures. The apartment features 3 bedrooms and 3.5 bathrooms with tremendous natural light and incredible views of the Hudson River. The gracious entertaining space boasts a large living room, corner dining area, windowed eat-in kitchen with granite counter tops and top-of-the-line stainless steel appliances. A spacious master suite has abundant closets including a huge walk-in, and five-fixture master bath. Two additional bedrooms and bathrooms, and powder room with w/d round out this 2,100+ square foot home.220 Riverside Boulevard is a premier Upper West Side condo conveniently located close to Riverside Park, Lincoln Center, and Central Park. Five-star building amenities include 24-hour white glove doorman, concierge, garage in the building with private elevator access, 12,500 sq ft health club with a large swimming pool/hot tub, private large internal courtyard, formal party room, billiard's room, bike room and children's play room.

Open city views from this high floor, Prewar, Classic six home. This spacious home features a large formal dining room with East facing windows. The living room faces west with open city views of the Upper West Side skyline and peaks of the river. The master bedroom faces north and west and has a windowed en suite bathroom. The second bedroom and maids room both face East and get nice light. With some TLC, the windowed eat in kitchen can be a cooks dream. 221 West 82nd Street is a full service building with a roof deck, central laundry, bike room and storage (waiting list), full-time doorman, and live-in super. Located near many restaurants and shops, and in close proximity to the subway.

Welcome home to 222 Hancock Street- an impeccably restored landmark townhouse that is now stunning high-end boutique condominiums, located on Bedford Stuyvesant's single most desirable block. This 20' X 70' Romanesque Revival mansion is of rare architectural pedigree built at a time when Hancock Street was one of the most coveted in all of Brooklyn.
Unit 1 is one of the grandest, and most lovingly restored condominium homes ever offered in Bed Stuy. It occupies the entire parlor, garden, and basement levels of this massive, 20' X 70' building. It is a 3,127 square foot 3 Bedroom, 3 baths + 2 half bath triplex with an expansive deck, gas grill and an L shaped, 25' wide backyard. The 70' triple parlor floor is a true showpiece and an entertainer's dream. It features soaring ceilings with original plaster details and over 1,250 square feet of entertaining, living, and dining space. It has floors with original inlays, a pier mirror, original built-ins, pocket shutters, and beautiful antique mantle with a working gas fireplace. Rare stained glass windows are accented, flooding the apartment with natural northern and southern sunlight. The huge chef's kitchen features high-end stainless steel appliances, a large statuary island and a breakfast bar area with stunning woodwork. On this level and just off the kitchen, is a wrap-around, 206 square foot deck, perfect for grilling and entertaining.

An exquisitely designed staircase leads down to the backyard perfect for relaxing and/or gardening. On the floor below are three very large bedrooms all with en-suite baths. The master bedroom suite includes two separate closets and an implacably designed master bathroom with double vanities, heated flooring, and steam shower. The stone lined wine cellar is temperature regulated and is perfect for wine connoisseurs! The rec-room level has an additional working fireplace. The home has central AC; heat zoned by room, a washer/dryer, and video intercom. Conveniently surrounded by the best that Bed Stuy has to offer including trendy shops/restaurants (Peaches Hot House, Eugene & Company, Hart's, Saraghina, Black Swan, Le Paris Dakar, Bed-Vyne Brew). The C, and A express train (which will get you to Manhattan faster than the C from Clinton Hill!) and the LIRR are extremely close.

This home is a superb townhouse alternative offering horizontal living, preserved detail, and a location that is difficult to match.

The sale of the units within 222 Hancock Condominium is pursuant to Index Number NA17-0029, which is on file with the New York State Department of Law (the "No Action Application"). Investors are advised that sales are conducted pursuant to the No Action Application. 222 Hancock LLC, the developer of the property, shall respond to offers of interest from individuals and entities that possess a background in acquiring real estate or engaging in commercial real estate transactions in New York City. Equal housing opportunity.

Welcome home to 222 Hancock, an impeccably restored landmark townhouse that will be converted into two high-end boutique condominiums, located on arguably Bed Stuy's single most desirable block. This 20ft wide Romanesque Revival building is of a rare architectural pedigree, built at a time when Hancock Street was one of the most coveted in all of Brooklyn.

Unit 2 is a nearly 2000 sqft. duplex with 3 Bedrooms, 2.5 baths, an expansive porcelain paved terrace and a stunning full floor roof deck overlooking Brooklyn and Manhattan. The main living level occupies a full floor offering approximately 1000 square feet for living, dining, cooking, and entertaining. There is an open chef's kitchen with high-end stainless steel appliances and large statuary marble island. On this level, there is a 20ft terrace; an oasis for gardening and grilling all year long. The living room has coffered ceilings and a beautiful antique mantle with working gas fireplace. In totality, this floor offers an almost unheard of 70ft living and entertaining space. All three bedrooms are large and are on the upper level. The Master bedroom consists of an en-suite bathroom with double vanities, four shower heads, heated flooring, steam shower and a huge walk-in closet with a skylight! An exquisitely designed wrought iron staircase leads up to the roof deck which opens into approximately 900 square feet of outdoor space. Rare arched stained glass windows are accented throughout the unit, flooding the apartment with natural sunlight from every angle. In total, there are 14 windows pouring in both northern and southern natural light. The unit has central AC, heat zoned by room, a washer/dryer, and video intercom. This Penthouse is a detail lover's dream; full of rich, original character carefully preserved.

Conveniently located very close to trendy shops/restaurants (Peaches Hot House, Eugene & Company, Saraghina, Black Swan) and A, C express train stop and the LIRR. This unit is a luxurious apartment, a one-of-a-kind home.

Apartment 3N at the Sequoia is a more than any ordinary one bedroom, it is an over-sized one bedroom *plus* and features a sprawling layout complete with state of the art kitchen, dining alcove or office space, a massive living room and two major walk-in closets.

Once you walk into the entry corridor you will be struck not just by the tasteful, wide plank hardwood floors but also the sheer size of this nearly 785 square foot apartment. To your right is a newly renovated kitchen with sleek stone countertops and state of the art GE appliances including dishwasher. The vented stovetop looks onto a wonderful lipped countertop that doubles as an awesome breakfast bar. Adjacent to the kitchen is a large open area perfect for a dining nook or home office and has access to a walk in closet. The bathroom is newly renovated featuring stylish tile design and tub with rain shower. Both the living room and the bedroom have double paned windows that keep the apartment silent, facing north with sunny views of Chelsea. Bedroom has the second walk in closet and can easily accommodate all your furniture and then some!

This is the perfect one bedroom plus at the crossroads of two of the most in-demand neighborhoods of Chelsea and West Village. Steps to public transit on both the A, C, E as well as the 1, 2, 3 lines you can be anywhere in minutes at this location, not to mention the accessibility to all the nightlife, restaurants, shopping and cultural institutions these neighborhoods have to offer. The Sequoia is a full-service doorman building with on-site parking, a gym, live-in super, laundry room and undergoing a beautiful lobby renovation projected to be completed in November. Welcome home!

Mint condition south two bedroom loft with two full baths, towering twelve foot ceilings and exceptional light from eight foot tall windows. Your over-sized and airy living room lends itself to entertaining with plenty of space for a large dining table and sitting area. A surprisingly large home office area outside the master and second bedrooms has two adjacent desks and is perfect for those who work at home or simply need some creative space. A large master bedroom easily accommodates any size bed and leads to an enormous dressing room / walk-in closet. The master bathroom finished in Ann Sacks tile features radiant heated floors, side by side sinks and rain showerhead. Built in 1910 as a paper factory, 222 is a meticulously maintained concrete and steel beaux-arts building ensuring absolute quiet with no sound traveling between apartments. The most fabulous roof deck of any building of its scale is available exclusively to residents and their guests. Pets are welcome. There is a live-in superintendent who takes packages and the building has a modern video intercom and keyed elevator entry system. Additional storage comes with the apartment. Complimentary laundry is on the floor though private laundry can be installed in the apartment. Beautifully Renovated 1 Bedroom with Wrap-Balcony and Powder Room.

Quiet and bright, this beautiful 16th floor 1 bedroom 1.5 bath home features a gracious entrance foyer preceding a south-west corner-exposure living room with floor-to-ceiling glass and a wonderful 84 square foot wrap-balcony. The living room is 17 feet wide by 20 feet in length and two pairs of sliding glass doors allow access to the balcony. The renovated windowed kitchen features maple cabinetry, granite counter tops, stainless appliances, porcelain tile floors and a breakfast bar. With a large pass-thru to the living room, the apartment is perfect for those who like to cook and entertain.

The large south-facing bedroom easily accommodates a king-sized bed, has a renovated en-suite Carrera marble bathroom plus a large walk-in closet. Additional features of the home include a Carrera marble powder room just off the foyer, gorgeous maple hardwood floors, a large coat-utility closet and central heat and air conditioning.

Located between 2nd and 3rd Avenues, The Vanderbilt is the gold-standard of full-service doorman condominiums in Murray Hill. The building's amenities include a magnificent health club with a 70 foot indoor swimming pool, Jacuzzi, multiple saunas as well as cardio and weigh-training equipment, a squash/racquetball/half basketball court, men's and women's locker rooms with steam showers, a furnished lounge area with a television plus a separate recreation room with ping-pong.

The building's oversized laundry room is located on this amenity level, and four elevators provide convenient, direct access to the adjacent garage. Additional building features include a private driveway that makes pick-ups and drop-offs easy for residents, a building link system that provides email notifications of package and dry cleaning deliveries, an on-site dry cleaner as well as a salon. Situated just a few short blocks from Grand Central, residents have easy access to all public transportation options including the eastside and westside subway lines plus Metro-North.
SORRY, NO PETS PERMITTED.

Sophisticatedly designed by the renowned Pembrooke & Ives, this Upper West Side three bedroom, two and a half bath condominium home on the tenth floor at The Astor truly is incomparable.

A striking entry gallery welcomes you into a warm great room with an open eat-in-kitchen. The smartly designed kitchen features Lerfoy Brooks fixtures, Calacatta marble countertops and backsplash, custom paneled millwork in matte white, a center island clad in full Calacatta marble slabs complete with a tasteful assortment of top of the line Gaggenau, Miele, and Subzero appliances.

The beautiful master bedroom is accompanied by a sophisticated master bathroom veiled in floor to ceiling Calacatta Gold, Nero Gold and Tundra Grey marble tiles accented by Haisa marble mosaics. A deep MTI freestanding soaking tub, Lefroy Brooks fixtures throughout, double sink vanity, radiant heated floors, Durviat by Starck wall mounted water closet and shower complete the lavish bathroom.

The additional two bedrooms have custom en-suite bathrooms which feature Lefroy Brooks fixtures, 24 inch square honed Glassos tile floors lined with 6 inch square ceramic tiled walls completed with custom vanities of Glassos slab, custom frameless medicine cabinets, Kohler under mount porcelain sinks, Durviat by Starck wall mounted water closet, Kohler under mount bathtub with polished Glassos slab deck within the shower.

A powder room decked with Nordic Grey Stone slab and a polished Glassos countertop with nickel vanity pedestal. A laundry area with a Bosch washer/dryer completes this exceptional home.

Additional Features Include:5in Herringbone floors in living areas with walnut inlay; Double paned insulated windows; Individual climate control in every room; 10ft ceilings; Smartly prewired for motorized shades, advanced home automation, AV systems, and TimeWarner Cable or Fios

A private keyed elevator opens into exquisitely-designed living space graced by lovely oak wood floors, distinctive beamed ceilings, a custom lighting system, long gallery for displaying artwork, and natural light from 4 exposures. Further along down the windowed gallery hall is a private home office with an en-suite bath, a well-proportioned media room or bedroom plus 2 additional comfortable bedrooms. This beautiful home also comes complete with washer/dryer and central air conditioning. Built in 1935 and converted to 8 exquisite full-floor condos in 2007, 24 East 21st Street is an intimate residence in the heart of Flatiron with an elevator, cyber doorman and pet-friendly policy.

Country club living with fabulous heated pool and spa, lighted tennis court, separate 2 story studio bldg. with 3 car garage. Formal gated driveway with 4 flat useable, fenced acres. This beautiful home is an oversized 898 square foot (83.42 sq m) 1 Bedroom residence which can easily convert to a Jr. Four. This impeccable 3 bedroom, 3.5 bath apartment is located in the Heritage at 240 Riverside Boulevard, on 72nd street hovering over the Hudson River. The apartment is a spacious, peaceful oasis, and provides completely open, unobstructed views of the river, the George Washington Bridge and beautiful Riverside Park, the only such exposure in New York City. This apartment not at all a cookie-cutter was designed to have a different view in as you walk from room to room. Throughout this apartment you will find 11-foot ceilings with full-height windows and automatic shades to manage the abundant sunlight. Other highly crafted details include granite bathrooms with a soaking tub, an eat-in Poggen-Pohl kitchen with garden views, walnut herringbone floors, cherry doors and a library with quilted maple panels. There is a two-sided fireplace in the living and formal dining rooms (only 2 in the whole building), and a large terrace with wide open city views. Comforts include an advanced remote control lighting system, a washer/dryer, six ample custom closets, three in the master bedroom, as well as five additional storage units in the building.The Heritage is a modern white glove building that offers a 15,000 square foot fitness center featuring a lap pool, whirlpool, massage room, workout equipment, steam room, sauna, personal training and classes. There is a valet parking garage that lets you take the elevator straight to you car, conference and event space, a cinema, an interior garden courtyard, children's playroom and separate laundry, and 24/7 white glove service staff.

242 Broome represents a rare opportunity for anyone seeking a modern home in the Lower East Side, one of New York's most storied neighborhoods. Designed by next-generation firm SHoP Architects, the building's champagne-colored façade softly reflects the surrounding buildings, while capturing an ever-changing dance between past and future. Utilizing a sophisticated mix of materials - slab marble, blackened steel, and warm woods - the artistic, custom-designed interiors by DXA Studio exude calm and comfort.

This one-of-a-kind 1,683 SF, three-bedroom, three and a half bathroom residence features 10'1/2" ceilings and 7" wide-plank white oak floors throughout. The gracious, sun-soaked, open concept living and kitchen space embraces south and west exposures, and is complete with a dining area perfect for entertaining. The kitchen offers warm grey walnut cabinetry with a polished Calacatta marble countertop, backsplash, and kitchen island. Fully integrated, state-of-the-art Gaggenau appliances include a stainless steel 36" five-burner gas cooktop, 30" electric oven, 30" speed oven, refrigerator, freezer, and wine refrigerator.

The master bedroom reveals an oversized walk-in closet and a luxurious en suite master bath with radiant heated flooring. Alanur honed marble floors and wet walls, Imperial Danby countertops, a custom walnut vanity, and a shower with thermostat and volume regulators are complemented by Duravit polished chrome fixtures. The secondary bedrooms also provide ample closet space and en-suite bathrooms with honed marble floors and tiled wet walls. Off the foyer, the stylish powder room has honed marble floors and a floor-to-ceiling surface mounted mirror, with a Corian vanity and sink.

The residence comes complete with a washer and dryer, and the option to purchase residential storage. 242 Broome's extensive, lifestyle-enhancing amenity program includes: 24-hr doorman/concierge and building manager, fitness center with changing areas, entertainment lounge with kitchen, flex space and billiards, and a beautifully landscaped rooftop terrace with outdoor dining. The building is also expected to offer an anticipated 421-a tax abatement.

This charming pre-war 2 bedroom 2 bathroom condo at The Century boasts 1640 square feet, embracing the distinctive art deco details unique to this New York City landmark. The spacious layout of this residence is separated yet balanced by a grand entrance foyer. To the left, the windowed kitchen with adjoining dining room features fully restored glass front cabinets, black stone countertops and stainless steel appliances including a Sub Zero refrigerator and Miele dishwasher. The original floor plan included a powder room off of the kitchen that was converted into a laundry room. To the right off of the entry landing, step down into a sunny and south facing living room with open views of 15 Central Park West to Columbus Circle. An original decorative fireplace with the Century's art deco logo is etched into the custom mirror hanging just above; a notable design element. Down the hallway are two large closets leading to the bedrooms at the back of the apartment. The master bedroom with ensuite bath includes 2 large custom built closets as well as the second bedroom/home office across the hallway. Additional residence details include hardwood floors, recessed lighting, generous storage and closet space.
The Century is a full service luxury prewar condominium built in the 1930's by Irwin Chanin. It spans an entire block on Central Park West from West 62nd to West 63rd Streets. Architecturally significant, with three attended entrances and 24/7 concierge, it is an excellent investment destination for a gracious home or perfect pied a terre. Additionally, there are 2 central laundry rooms, bike room, landscaped courtyard and private storage for rent (currently there is waiting list). In addition to the park and Lincoln Center, highly rated restaurants, upscale shopping and a Whole Foods Market are nearby at Time Warner Center.

Two-bedroom two-bathroom, stunningly renovated Upper East Side home with washer and dryer is perfectly located between Madison and Fifth Avenues. The windowed dining area offers easy access to a beautiful open kitchen that boasts Miele cooktop, convection & speed ovens, a wine fridge, and gorgeous Scavolini cabinets. The master bedroom has Eastern exposure with amazing light and views. The master bed boasts custom fitted closets and a spa like en suite master bath with a Lacava tub, Scavolini counters, Calacatta Gold marble on walls, Basaltina Romana heated floors, and Toto toilet. The second bedroom is also Sun-filled with Eastern lighting, located adjacent to the guest bathroom that also contains Scavolini counters, marble walls, Basaltina Romana heated floors, and Toto Neorest wash let. This stunning home features built in surround system, motorized roller shades in the living room and bedrooms, central AC, washer and dryer, recessed lighting & TV sound system controlled by a Control 4 home automation system. This full-service pet-friendly building has a fitness room, and is in close proximity to Madison Avenue shopping, Central Park, and the Metropolitan Museum.

RARELY AVAILABLE sun-flooded, move-in-ready, corner 2br/2ba in renowned Tudor Tower.

Welcome to a beautiful high-floor, split layout apartment with a wide open view of peaceful Tudor City South Park. The gorgeous hardwood floors, beamed ceilings, and original windows ooze New York's classic pre-war charm. This perfectly laid out home allows for living and dining areas and abundant custom built-in closet space in all rooms. No details were spared in the renovation of this unit: from the recessed lighting in the entrance to the Cesar stone kitchen counter tops and subway tile backsplash, and high-end stainless steel appliances, you will be delighted by the quality of the finishes. Your electricity, AC, heat and hot water are all included in the maintenance which is 50% tax deductible.

Built in 1929 by developer Fred French, Tudor Tower is a 23-floor, Gothic-style, red brick building which counts a full time doorman, a gorgeous roof deck with city and river views, a laundry room, a bike room, and a storage room. Residents also have access to 5 Tudor Place's gym for a fee. Close proximity to the Ford Foundation, United Nations, East River, and Grand Central make this building a Murray Hill favorite.

Tudor Tower is a flexible co-op which allows pied-a-terres, co-purchasing, purchasing for children, purchasing in a trust. 80% financing is also allowed. For investors, subletting is allowed 5 out of 10 years after 1 year of occupancy! For your storage needs, two sizes of cages are available for rent for $40 and $80 month (waiting list) Cats are allowed but sorry, no dogs.

Gracious prewar, top floor apartment flooded with light. Hardwood floors, high ceilings, 6 south-facing windows, and a windowed, eat-in kitchen. Just updated! Come home to this gorgeous home in the heart of Battery Park for the best 1 bed condo for only $698K in Manhattan. This stunning space has sweeping southern and western views through huge windows. Outside the building you have one of the most pristine and manicured neighborhoods in Manhattan with wonderful parks and access to the waterfront. The neighborhood is booming with some of the best additions to quality living in the city with the Marina and Brookfield place just to the north and the WTC site, Oculus and Westfield mall just the east. There is also the rest of Financial District, Tribeca and Soho all a short walk under 15 minutes. More about neighborhood and building can be found at http://batteryparkcity.net

Call us to schedule a showing and make this incredible home yours.

Welcome to this spacious and sun-flooded Eastern facing 3 bedrooms and 2.5 baths. The historic French limestone building was originally built in 1913 and was converted to condominium residences in 2008, offering a delightful mix of loft-like contemporary functionality with historic architectural contrasts. Amenities include a private gym and lounge for residents as well as a 24 hour concierge and resident manager. Situated between Madison Square Park, Gramercy Park and Union Square, residents at 254 Park Avenue South are in the center of it all. Ultra luxury 254 Park Avenue South is the epitome of the NYC high life. This large one bedroom, plus home office, and loft space has 2 full bathrooms. The apartment includes washer and dryer and stainless steel appliances. Excellent storage above the kitchen in the loft space.

All of the breathtaking finishes and amenities make this beautifully restored limestone building the perfect marriage of period character and modern style. The entire building has been expertly designed by Charles Allem. Allem is known for his glamorous interiors characterized by sumptuous materials and sleek compositions which are immediately apparent when you enter the lobby door.

The building features 24 hour Doorman, Resident fitness center with cardiovascular and weight-lifting machines and a private Lounge with poker and pool tables.

Located in the heart of the Flatiron district you are right nearby Union Square and Madison Square and Gramercy. You will love this location central to all the trains and everything that Manhattan has to offer

Authentic Tribeca loft! Enter this big, bright, open space to find an imposing row of 10' windows lining the northern wall. 13' ceilings allow multiple options for this Bohemian home, currently configured with a lofted master sleeping area and added room usable as an office, second sleeping space or sound proof recording studio. Voluminous living and dining areas with a view to City Hall Park, library study lined with bookshelves and a cherry red & stainless steel kitchen complete this delightful home which is jam-packed with character.
