With a highly coveted DEEDED indoor parking space, a HUGE private storage room, 3 exposures, a private balcony, a large capacity vented washer/dryer and countless recent upgrades, this 2 bedroom, 2 bath South Slope condo is sure to go quickly!

Overall this apartment has a very thoughtful floor plan with high ceilings and great separation of space that makes it feel more like a sprawling HOME beginning with a wide entry foyer that includes room for a bench to remove your shoes after a long day and an ample coat closet. The windowed kitchen is separate and includes space for a table for four, abundant storage in dark stained cabinetry, a new sink and faucet, all new hardware, new plumbing and stainless steel appliances including a nearly new stove with 5 burners and a double oven. The living room is open and large enough for even oversize furniture or to section off a home office space if needed and includes sliding glass doors on one end that lead you to the well-sized balcony overlooking the tree lined street and with seasonal views of the Statue of Liberty.

The master bedroom is very spacious and would comfortably accommodate even the largest of king sized furnishings and has double closets plus upper storage. The master bathroom has a large stall shower plus a new cabinet with great storage, all new faucets and hardware and great natural light through a glass blocked window. The second bedroom is generously sized with a large closet and additional upper storage. A second full bath with a large Jacuzzi tub, also with a new cabinet, faucets and hardware, plus a glass block window for light rounds out the floor plan. The entire home has been recently painted, has solid hardwood floors throughout, central AC, dimmer switches, video intercom, and all of the closets are outfitted with the Elfa storage system.

This 20 unit elevator building has a recently renovated common interior courtyard, tax abatement through 2029, low common charges and is zoned for PS 10.

Located just a couple of blocks to the R or the F/G trains and only steps from all of the great dining, shopping and nightlife that Park Slope has to offer.

27A Harrison Street is one of the most historic houses in New York City. Constructed originally in 1819, it was one of the first to be designated a New York City landmark by the then-new Landmarks Preservation Commission in 1966. It exists in a row of beautiful Federal houses whose restoration had been commissioned by the L.P.C. itself. Townhouses are rare to Tribeca, and these are the most famous and desirable of all.

27A is the jewel in the crown, and the largest of the group. It is 25 feet wide and has 3,700 square feet of living space. Dean/Wolf Architects designed the luminous interior, complete with seven fireplaces. The entire home is centrally air-conditioned.

The front stoop leads to a diaphanous parlor level, highlighting high ceilings over a living room with wood-burning fireplace, large open kitchen, dining area, and access to a beautiful south-facing garden.

A stunning and unique staircase rises to the second level, which features two large bedrooms and a bathroom.

The entire third level is a master suite measuring over 500 square feet. It includes a wood-burning fireplace and wonderful Federal-era gables. A skylight above filters light throughout the house.

The English basement, with interior and separate exterior access, has a large, private recreation room, a music room that convertible to other uses, two fireplaces, and mechanicals. This level also leads to the superb 506-square foot south garden.

Do you want to live on one of the most beautiful park blocks in Park Slope? Do you love original detail? Do you want the opportunity to make a house your own? Do you want to own a brownstone with a deeded parking space (not included in the price)? 282 Garfield Place is the house you are looking for.

282 Garfield Place can easily be transformed into a 2 family with rental income or a grand single family house, The owners' duplex, which is made up of the parlor floor and the floor above, has extraordinary original detail, including original mahogany wainscoting and extraordinary crown molding. You enter the parlor floor through original beveled-glass pocket doors and then move through to the center parlor with an original decorative fireplace. You then pass through a second set of original pocket doors into the extra-large formal dining room with vintage Tiffany style chandelier, original herringbone oak floors, and a second detailed fireplace. A renovated kitchen in the rear extension, with granite countertops and stainless appliances completes the parlor floor, with access to the beautifully landscaped garden.

On the third floor, there is a lovely sitting area off the hallway, with original mahogany woodwork, as well as a hallway bathroom. There are two large bedrooms, with beautiful crown molding and a pass through with original ceramic sinks and original built in storage. A back staircase provides access to the parlor floor.

A top floor rental unit completes the building. It is currently configured as a 2 bedroom/ 1 bath apartment with renovated eat-in-kitchen.

You will live less than a block to the Garfield Place entrance to Prospect Park, and just a short distance to the main branch of the Brooklyn Public Library, the Brooklyn Botanic Gardens and the Brooklyn Museum On Saturdays, you can enjoy the wonders of the Greenmarket at Grand Army Plaza. 7th Avenue shopping and restaurants are nearby, as well as the 2,3, B, Q trains to Manhattan.

New Price! First time in 40 years, this top floor classic 7 room apartment is now being offered for sale. You will love the original oak wood floors, prewar 10ft high beamed ceilings and gorgeous wood paneling hand-chiseled by Italian artisans in the 80's. An arched hand-carved doorway graciously opens into the expansive living room from the quaint celestial-celinged foyer. The gallery to the formal dining room is perfect for hanging your prized artwork. Extra windows have been added in the master bedroom for beautiful southeast light. It has a separate windowed bathroom. The 2nd bedroom has a windowed en-suite bath. The 2 maid's rooms can be turned into an office or 3rd bedroom with its own windowed bathroom. The long kitchen also has its own window. Design this apartment according to your modern day needs and lifestyle.


29 East 64th Street is a premier 1922 brick and limestone 12-story building designed by George Frederick Pelham. From the top floor apartment, you can enjoy the classic view of the Verona building elegantly designed by the Wm Mowbray featured in Historic Manhattan Apartment Houses. Enjoy the luxury of having only 2 apartments per floor with its semi-private vestibule from the elevator. Nestled in the heart of Madison's finest stores with Chanel occupying its prime retail space, 29 East 64th Street offers posh white glove service with 24-hour doorman. Pied-a-terres and pets allowed. Central Laundry. Storage included.

Enjoy this rare penthouse 1-Bedroom with generous, spacious and sun-lit rooms with soaring 12ft+ ceilings, in the historic Cotton Exchange Building.

This highly sought-after sun-lit, 1 Bedroom / 1 Bathroom top-floor penthouse is an ideal home with a spacious open layout, open kitchen, loft-like high ceilings, and custom storage, hardwood floors throughout. Every window has sunny treetop and private courtyard views, enjoyed only by a few. The classic pre-war construction ensures quiet enjoyment!

The master bedroom is equipped with an extremely generous, and well-outfitted, walk-in closet. Its spacious bathroom, wrapped in marble, has a walk-in shower with a multitude of spa-like features; double rainfall shower heads over a marble bench, 3 body jets and steam to complete the relaxing experience.

Entertaining or simple meals are a joy in this top-of-the-line-equipped open chef's kitchen. It was remodeled by Neff Kitchen with blonde walnut cabinetry and matching doors to conceal the Sub Zero refrigerator. Rare Juparana Colombo Granite also wraps the kitchen surfaces, backsplash and the bi-level chef's island which houses the sub-zero wine cooler and breakfast bar, offering multiple dining options.

Keep your oversized furniture. The living room is spacious and has dedicated entertainment center nook and is prewired for surround sound.

3 Hanover Square is a unique full service and pet-friendly building with a rich history. Amenities include a 24-hour doorman, package delivery, live-in super, courtyard, garden, laundry on every third floor, and shared common storage for each apartment.

The location is ideally situated near Wall Street, Battery Park, the newly opened Oculus, Westfield Mall Brookfield Place, as well as the soon-to-open Whole Foods at One Wall Street. The Fulton Street hub with 4/5/W/R/1/2/3/J/Z subway lines connect you to the rest of Upper and Lower Manhattan and Brooklyn with ease. From Pier 11, you can enjoy ferry service to Astoria, Dumbo, Williamsburg, Red Hook, midtown, as well as the Rockaways and NJ, by boat.

$400,000 Price Drop!

Mint 2 Bed, 2 Bath + Dining Room in a Full-Service, New Condominium Conversion Right Next to Central Park.

This Sunny, West-facing home features Treetop and Partial Lincoln Center Views through New Double-Paned Oversize Windows, Hardwood Floors and Washer/Dryer.

A Spacious Living Room and a Large Dining Room give you plenty of room to entertain and dine.

Cooks will enjoy the Large Renovated Stainless Kitchen with Wood Cabinets and Absolute Black Granite Countertops.

The Split Bedroom layout is ideal. The Master Bedrooms is enormous, has 5 Closets and an En-Suite Limestone Bath with Kohler Sink and Toilet. The Second Bedroom is equally large and features a Kohler Bath.

You will love living steps from The Park, Lincoln Center, Whole Foods & the Time Warner Center.

30 Lincoln Plaza has 24 HR Concierge, Doorman, Top of the Line Health Club (for a fee) with Classes, a Swimming Pool with Central Park Views, Jacuzzi, Steam Room, Sauna, Massage Room, a Furnished Roofdeck with Cabanas, and a Residents Lounge with a Fireplace, a Bar and Floor to Ceiling Windows with Panoramic Central Park Views.

This Pet Friendly Condo (dogs under 20 lbs.) also has a Driveway, a Parking Garage, a Bike Room, a Children's Play Room, Billiards Room, Putting Green.

This is a beautiful west facing home on the 31st floor with 9 feet ceiling on the waterfront of Battery Park City. You can watch the stunning sunsets from every room of this relaxing apartment of 1190sqft with living space, 2 bedrooms 2 bathrooms, and separate master suite with double marble sinks, soaking tub and separate glass shower. Oversized windows - and a custom kitchen with a stone countertops, Miele dishwasher, Viking gas range, Subzero refrigerator/freezer, and a U-line wine cooler. Open living concept with incredible views of the Statue of Liberty, and the Hudson River. Green living meets luxurious amenities in this LEED gold certificated building. With its 24 hour concierge and doorman, 1,500 Sq Ft Fitness room, Bicycle Storage, Children's Playroom & Valet Parking. Its air filtration system provides residents with fresh tempered and filtered air directly to the apartment. Its solar rooftop, advanced mechanicals and rooftop water cachet system are all designed to save energy as well as reduce building expenses. Just steps from 25-acre Battery Park, Sirius Dog Run, Eataly NYC Downtown, Le District, Regal Cinemas movie theater complex, and Brookfield Place and Westfiled WTC shopping centers. Only several minutes walk to Wall Street, Tribeca, and close to all subway lines, fantastic restaurants and shops. Please contact Calvin for showing.

This extremely well-priced sprawling, triple mint 3 bedroom/2.5 bathroom loft-style, corner residence boasts 10 foot ceilings and open, city views of the Chrysler Building, Empire State Building as well as the the western sky through floor to ceiling windows. The spacious living room has a flexible layout and plenty of room for a separate dining area. The open, windowed kitchen was designed by Gruppo Italia and has top-of-the-line appliances by Bosch. The floor to ceiling windows in the entertaining rooms have been outfitted with remote controlled shades. The master bedroom has a walk-in closet with en-suite bathroom. There are two additional bedrooms which share a full bath and a powder room, as well.Building amenities include Abigail Michaels Concierge Services, fitness center and spa, rooftop, and back patio. Built in 2010, The Tempo is a high-end, new development condominium in Gramercy with a 421A tax abatement until 2022.

This grand two bedroom, two bathroom home offers floor-to-ceiling windows, a large private corner terrace, and northern, southern, and eastern exposures. The kitchen offers Bosch appliances, Liebherr refrigerator and Grohe Ladylux Chrome fixtures. The bathrooms offer fixtures by Grohe and Turkish Calacatta marble. Other residence highlights in this corner apartment include oak flooring, a windowed kitchen and a spacious and generous floor plan. Building amenities include a landscaped roof deck with grilling station and wet bar, resident's lounge with library and media room, gym, fitness studio, treatment room and laundry lounge. Sponsor offering 5% contract deposit and immediate occupancy!

Welcome to Strivers Garden!

Triple exposure of north, east and west, the 7 windows infuse the apartment with natural sunlight and expose incredible, unobstructed views of Uptown, Saint Nicholas Park, and City College!

This sun-drenched 1,114 Square Foot unit is one-of-a-kind. The condominium offers a spacious layout with 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, while maintaining modest monthly costs and a tax abatement until 2031.

This corner unit is appointed with customized Hunter Douglas Duette shades, hardwood floors throughout, and recessed lighting, complimented with crown and baseboard molding. The master bedroom is a relaxing oasis; boasting an over-sized walk-in closet and a stunning bath with a spacious stand-up shower, double sided mirror, and pristine tiles.

The open galley kitchen boasts a roomy Subzero refrigerator, Wolf range stove, Viking microwave, Miele dishwasher, a considerable amount of cabinets with remote controlled countertop-lighting and complemented by a elegant marble back-splash.

Building Amenities Include:

- 24 Hour Doorman & Concierge
- Parking Garage
- Zip Car rental in parking garage
- Courtyard & Zen Garden
- State of the Art Fitness Center
- Laundry Facility
- Resident's Lounge
- Wi-Fi Access
- Elevator
- On-Site Super

The B & C trains are located on the corner of West 135th St. and Saint Nicholas Ave.
The 2 & 3 Express Trains are located on West 135th and Lenox Ave.

ACTUAL VIEW PICTUES! A rare jewel high above Manhattan. Stunning and precious, this spacious two bedroom, two bath apartment has not one, but two covered outdoor spaces that offer sweeping and unobstructed views of Central Park, Columbus Circle, and the gorgeous skyline. Enjoy breathtaking vistas that span to the north from the George Washington Bridge to the southern tip of New York City and beyond. A formal entrance foyer leads you into an expansive living room with three exposures and an oversize bay window. There is a designer open chef's kitchen with breakfast bar then opens up to the dining room. The kitchen comes complete with Eggersmann Cabinetry, SubZero refrigerator, Fisher Paykel double drawer dishwasher, and an in-wall Miele/ Nespresso Cappuccino maker . The bedrooms are both spacious and their split layout is optimal for privacy. The extra large master suite has expansive views of Central Park, while the second bedroom gets a birds eye view of the Manhattan Skyline and World Trade Center. Ample custom built closet space, a vented washer/dryer, and marble baths complete this home. The Central Park Place is one of Manhattan's most desirable condominiums. Services include a 24-hour doorman; health club with indoor swimming pool, sauna, boxing room, massage room, yoga room; terrace; party room/lounge; overnight guest suites; and even a private entrance to subway. Pets are welcome.

Large studio with walk-in windowed kitchen. Living space is graciously designed with state-of-the-art wall bed built into a custom-designed cabinet, with two bookshelves that convert into a wall of bookshelves when the queen-sized bed is tucked away. Windowed Chef's kitchen with custom cabinets and granite countertops. Kitchen appliances include a Viking full range, microwave and dishwasher, and a full refrigerator. Large formal entryway can double as an ideal dining room area. Ample closet space throughout. Spa-like bathroom has been upgraded, with a custom bamboo vanity and a rain showerhead. Rich original wood in the completely restored pre-war parquet floors.303 East 37th Street is a pre-war co-op elevator building built in 1941. Lobby in Art Deco Style in the heart of Murray Hill. Near Grand Central and all transportation. Neighborhood has many eateries, shops, and supermarkets. All pet friendly with board approval, super lives on the premises for easy package receiving. Storage available for small additional monthly fee. Bike room. Gifting okay

Move-in ready and one block away from new Second Avenue Subway (Q & N lines) on 86th Street and Second Avenue! Beautifully renovated 4-story red brick townhouse on the Upper East Side with 4 bedrooms and 760sf private garden. No detail was overlooked in the restoration of this early twentieth century home. The garden floor boasts a state-of-the-art windowed chef's kitchen with Sub Zero and Viking appliances and wine refrigerator. An adjoining dining or gallery area with powder room and cozy den with fireplace leads out to the beautifully landscaped garden, perfect for year-round grilling and spring and summer entertaining. On the parlor level is a grand living room with fireplace, dining area with wet bar, and a home office/study with fireplace. Much of the home's unique architectural history is evident on this floor, including 11-foot ceilings, arched entryways, wood-paneled window shutters, and an impressive Americana-style staircase. The third floor has two bedrooms (one with fireplace) that are serviced by one full bathroom. A newly renovated laundry room with separate washer and dryer are also on the floor. On the skylit fourth floor are two additional bedrooms (one with fireplace) and a luxurious spa bathroom complete with a Duravit soaking tub, steam shower, double sinks, and skylight. Additional features of the townhouse include two entries (stoop and under stoop) with front yard, hardwood floors throughout, and wine storage in the cellar.

Corner full-service luxury studio with private terrace and low-monthlies. Newly renovated hardwood floors throughout, entrance foyer which can be converted to a walk-in-closet, and full-size kitchen with Sub-Zero appliances. Upscale marble bathroom with dressing room and more closets! Pin-drop quiet and with private outdoor oasis to match. Excellent closet space, plus additional storage available, 24-hour doorman, fitness center, laundry room, outdoor rooftop lounge, bicycle room, pet-friendly and pied-a-terres welcome. Will not last! Contact Tatiana Mross of Douglas Elliman for showing.

LUMINOUS TRIPLEX PENTHOUSE WITH ICONIC LANDMARKED VIEWS AND THREE INCREDIBLE TERRACES

Tucked away on a serene street of Midtown East just down the block from the United Nations Headquarters in Turtle Bay Towers, this spectacular triplex Penthouse features 360 degree panoramic views of the Midtown skyline, the East River, the Chrysler, Empire State and UN Secretariat Buildings.

1116 SQ FT ENTRY LEVEL: Large sun flooded entrance gallery welcomes you to this very special home that has NEVER been on the market! On this floor you will find a sunny private guest suite with large walk in closet and a spa bathroom clad in beautiful limestone. A corner media room/library with full wet bar, expansive eastern and southern views, floor to ceiling book shelves perfectly designed for any book lover or movie buff. An additional bedroom/home office outfitted with built-in double desk and large closet.

1480 SQ FT ENTERTANING LEVEL: Gracious stairs take you to the incredible 52ft long great room with 14ft ceilings and breathtaking East, South and North open river views; flawlessly designed for formal and grand entertaining with an open dining room encompassing 23ft double height ceilings. A fully equipped butler's pantry with sink and full size Traulsen wine fridge compliments the professional eat in chef's kitchen with top of the line appliances including a SubZero refrigerator, Viking stove, an indoor Thermidor gas grill/griddle, two Kitchen Aid dishwashers, two sinks and walk-in pantry. A wonderful large south facing planted terrace with sweeping Empire State views completes this unparalleled entertaining floor.

UPPER LEVEL: Upon arrival to the third floor of the penthouse, you have access to the 1886 sq ft dual terraces that features 360 degree views of the Manhattan skyline for more entertaining! The terraces have enormous potential where you can create your private garden oasis in the middle of Manhattan!

Also on the third floor, you will find a fabulous 20'8 X 13'9 corner master bedroom emphasizing serene East River and city skyline views with ample amount of closet space and luscious windowed bath. A large sun filled second bedroom features a built in office nook and large outfitted closet. Additionally, there is a nicely appointed third bedroom. To complete this floor, there is a double height loft bedroom/studio with an en suite bathroom. Professional laundry room with sink, workspace and full scale washer/dryer that vents outside. Several walk in closets including a spacious cedar closet; one of which has plumbing and can easily be outfitted as a midnight bar.

PENTHOUSE DETAILS: Custom security alarm system with wireless transmitter; central vacuum system; 3 terraces; multiple air conditioning zones; custom built-in display vitrines; separate 33 sq ft storage room on entrance level; plus 24-hour doorman service and a live-in super; pet-friendly property; large renovated lobby with two sitting areas; a rooftop terrace; laundry; storage; bike room; and a parking garage.

Situated near the top of the iconic Link building, this fortieth floor two bedroom/two and a half bathroom home is perched high above it all. Offering almost 360 degree views, a well thought out floorplan, beautiful finishes, a split bedroom layout, and ceiling heights in excess of 10 feet, this property truly is a rare find. The property has high end contemporary finishes, and its soaring panels of glass and high ceilings provide amazing light and a sense of tranquility. The kitchen is located efficiently between the dining and living rooms, and is equipped with lacquered cabinetry designed by Poggenpohl, as well as top of the line appliances including Sub Zero refrigeration, a Bosch cook top, oven, and dishwasher, and a garbage disposal. Just off the kitchen is a breakfast nook/office, boasting southern and western exposures. The spa level bathrooms are crisply designed, and complete with meticulous tile work. The dining area is located in a corner surrounded by undulating glass, and the home's southwestern corner location provides unimpeded views from every room. The thoughtful floorplan also maximizes the privacy of the bedrooms. Included with this home is a large walk-in storage unit located in the building. Finally, a washer/dryer is located within this bright and quiet home. A stone's throw from Central Park, the Link offers a 24-hour doorman/concierge, onsite live-in super, a double height, glass-paned state-of-the-art fitness center and lounge, and a 3,200sf landscaped outdoor terrace. The building also is pet friendly, close to NYC's theater district, and convenient to all major transportation and award winning restaurants.

Classically renovated, two bed, one bath pre-war apartment is nestled on a quiet block in the heart of Yorkville. This spacious kitchen includes stainless steel appliances, Wolf 30" range with Miele hood and Miele dishwasher. Hardwood floors and generous closet space. This pet-friendly, co-op. has wonderful amenities: live-in Super, who accepts deliveries, bike room, laundry room, storage room, outdoor patio, and a large playroom well-suited for gatherings and parties. Within walking distance of the 4/5/6 subway and the new2nd Avenue Q train! Whole Foods, shopping and great dining are just around the corner. It's city living at its best!

SALES GALLERY & MODEL RESIDENCE LOCATED AT 6 BOND ST, SUITE 4

Located at 32 East 1st Street, this exquisite South facing two bedroom, two bathroom residence with 10 ceilings, expansive triple-pane windows, 222 SF private balcony and brushed solid white oak wood floors has been meticulously designed throughout, featuring enhancements typically overlooked; including an integrated audio system by Sonos, closets outfitted by Molteni, controlled recessed LED lighting by Delta and electronic shades by Lutron. Particular attention to detail is demonstrated in the open kitchen concept with precisely book-matched natural bianco lasa marble slab countertops and backsplashes, custom brushed solid oak wood Italian cabinets integrated with a full suite of Wolf, Miele and Sub-Zero appliances. The five fixture master bathroom sanctuary is beautifully appointed with Roman travertine walls and floors with radiant heat, perfectly accented by a brushed solid oak wood dual vanity topped with a Corian countertop and dual sinks, matched by a custom designed Antonio Lupi Sartoriale Cristalplant soaking tub; the space is completed with a separate glass enclosed rain-shower a wall mounted Duravit Washlet toilet and custom Italian fixtures by CEA Design. The secondary bathroom is also clad with travertine walls and radiant heated floors, a brushed solid oak wood vanity topped with a Corian countertop and sink, the space is completed with a glass enclosed rain-shower, a wall mounted Duravit Washlet toilet and custom Italian fixtures by CEA Design.

32 East 1st Street features a limited collection of thirty-one highly designed one to four bedroom residences at the nexus of NoHo, the East Village and Lower East Side. Inspired by the contemporary aesthetic of Italian rationalist design, 32 East 1st Street purposely lives within its urban context, presenting a substantial limestone exoskeleton accentuated by expansive triple-pane windows and geometric metal detailing.

SPONSOR UNIT/ NO BOARD APPROVAL Largest in the building 1 bedroom with 1-1/2 baths. Contemporary open floor plan with large living room 20'9" X 11'10" BEDROOM 15'8" X 11'9" . Bedroom and living room windows are just above the Woodstock's private garden. Airy open kitchen has light wood cabinets, adding to the sense of space. Convenient breakfast bar counter with granite countertops. Top-of-the-line dishwasher, full fridge, and full oven. Master bath has a soaking tub with jets and is completely tiled with European-style tile and trim. Half bath in entryway, fully tiled in cool, pale beige tones. Bedroom has a large walk-in closet (see photo), with lots of other closet space throughout the home. Stone tiles finish the kitchen floor and the welcoming entryway.Woodstock Towers is a landmark pre-war coop building. Well run, with excellent financials. Full service building with 24-hour Desk and Maintenance staff, electronic mail check-in, 24/7 concierge. Central to all subways, Grand Central & Penn Station for access to every part of the city. Gardened private backyard. Laundry at lobby level. Fitness center and storage available for small additional fee. Steps from 2 landmark parks, both with playgrounds. Bike room. Pet friendly. Pied-à-Terre, owners residing, and parents purchasing all OK. Heat/Hot Water/Electric included in maintenance fee. Please email phone number with appointment request.

This two family townhouse has been occupied by the current owner since 1983. It features a one bedroom, one bath garden floor-through rental unit having its own separate entrance as well as access to the rear yard, and highlights a 5 bedroom, 2 bath owner's triplex having a rear deck with steps leading to a relaxing garden. Updates in 1987 includes all new windows, new plumbing, updated electric, a new gas boiler and 4 heat zones. The hot water tank was replaced in 2014, the kitchen was renovated in 2004 and a layer was added to the roof in 2013. Located in prime Central Harlem in close proximity to City College, St. Nicholas Park, the Harlem YMCA, the Schomburg Center, Harlem Hospital, Strivers Row, Restaurant Row and the 2 ,3 , B, C subways. Just one train stop to 125th Street and to West 145th Street's commercial corridor. Call for a private viewing today!

Fabulous 1 bedroom located in the Flatbush section of Brooklyn. Two short blocks to transportation with the 2 and 5 train and several express buses to Manhattan. Excellent shopping and 2 new fitness centers. This 1 bedroom has brand new kitchen, updated bath, large living room and bedroom

This stunning 4 story plus cellar, approximately 4200 sq ft single family townhouse was built in 1890 and is located on a quiet tree-lined block in the heart of UWS, next to Riverside Park. It has 5-6 large bedrooms, 4 baths, 2 kitchens, a formal dining room and an attached garden apartment opening to a beautiful garden. This truly unique home combines an abundance of thoughtfully restored historic details including, original wainscoting, hardwood floors, and working gas fireplace, with numerous modern conveniences including central air, Sub-Zero refrigerator, Viking stove and 2 washer/dryers (one located on the top floor and one in the cellar). The property has been kept in pristine condition.Garden Level: Contains a separate entrance featuring a Billiards room, which can be converted to a 6th bedroom, Media Center/Den, separate storage unit, back Bedroom, 2nd Kitchen and leads straight to a beautiful 17 X 23 garden, ideal for outdoor entertaining.Parlor Level: Enter the parlor through the main entrance into an expansive living room with high ceilings, a gorgeous 15X18 dining room, kitchen that leads to a private balcony. The balcony has stairs that lead directly to the garden.Third Floor: The rear room is a spacious master bedroom, with a walk in closet, full bath with a large tub and a glass shower. The front bedroom has a full bath and large bay windows.Fourth Floor: Has 2 additional large bedrooms. The southern bedroom has a WIC and a private terrace. The floor also has a laundry room with a washer dryer, linen closet and sky light.This home has to be seen to be believed! A great home for high style suburban living in NYC

323 East 17th Street is a beautifully renovated, spacious single family home with 14 rooms, 6 well-proportioned bedrooms, 5 bathrooms, 2 powder rooms, approximately 7,000 SF of interior space on 6 levels and approximately 5,700 SF of useable air rights with no landmarks protection. The house is located adjacent to Stuyvesant Square Park and the Friends Seminary School in the historic Gramercy Park neighborhood. The gorgeous south-facing limestone façade, big windows and extra-high ceilings and doorways allow for excellent natural light. Unusually low real estate taxes of $23,434 p.a. are another benefit.

Location.StreetIntersection: River Side Dr. & West End Ave

BasicDetails.Description:
Located on a short and beautiful tree-lined block between Riverside Drive and West End Avenue, 324 West 80th Street is a rare 24-foot wide limestone townhouse, recently renovated with a brand new elevator. It offers over 8,000 square feet of living space with 6 bedrooms and 7.5 bathrooms. Built in 1898-1899 by noted architect, Clarence True, this six-story home features a stunning Elizabethan Renaissance Revival style bow-front façade with Roman brick and limestone trim and a ceramic tile pitched roof. Inside, generous proportions and bright light abound.

The Entry Floor welcomes guests into a gracious reception gallery with modern ribbon fireplace and a magnificent cherry wood sculptural staircase. A library and guest bedroom with full bath are located in the rear in addition to a separate service entrance on the western front of the house.

The Parlor Floor boasts almost 11-foot ceilings and offers a formal living room that spans the entire width of the house. It features a gas fireplace with remote-starter and a built-in wet bar. The south-facing dining room, with original dentil molding and beamed ceiling, is ornamented by a Juliet balcony that overlooks the house garden through stained glass windows. A professional-grade windowed chef's kitchen services the dining room and boasts a separate stainless steel prep area with industrial kitchen faucet sprayer, glass Sub Zero refrigerator, separate Sub Zero beverage refrigerator, Viking range, Monogram double ovens with a separate warming drawer, and two Bosch dishwashers. A powder room is located off the floor landing.

Upstairs on the Fourth Floor are three bedrooms. The rear south-facing bedroom serves as a second master suite and features a fireplace, two walk-in closets and an en-suite bath with double vanity, Jacuzzi tub and separate shower. A second full bathroom is located off the floor landing.

The Fifth Floor is dedicated to the master suite and highlights a spacious south-facing bedroom with fireplace and a windowed marble bath complete with a digitally controlled walk-in rain shower with double shower-heads, free-standing egg-shaped soaking tub, double vanity and heated floors and towel bars. A secondary full marble bathroom, sitting area with fireplace and a windowed dressing room with custom vanity and built-ins complete the floor.

The home's generous offering of entertaining space continues on the Sixth Floor with a sky-lit lounge with almost 18-foot ceilings. It is serviced by an auxiliary kitchenette with stainless steel appliances, a copper-top bar, large-screen TV and custom sound. There is also a guest bedroom with full bath and an enormous walk-in closet. Combined, all of these elements enable the floor to serve as an elegantly appointed guest suite/apartment, if so desired.

Beyond, a beautifully designed floating wood staircase off the lounge leads to a fully decked and planted Rooftop terrace featuring a temperature-controlled pavilion with wet-bar, glorious west, south and north views as well as custom lighting and sound.

The fully-finished Garden Level is spotlighted by a home theater, 500-bottle wine cellar, home office/secondary bedroom with full kitchenette, full bath, laundry, plentiful storage as well as a beautiful south-facing patio garden.

Additional features of the home include custom mink grey -stained oak floors throughout and a brand new high-speed Savaria elevator servicing the Entry through Sixth Floors. The new Sonos sound system, custom Lutron lighting (automated sensor lighting on all landings), and electronic front door can all be controlled by your cell phone. Also available for rent at $45,000 per month.

This beautiful newly renovated corner classic six home is located at the well-regarded Essex House in Tudor City, one of the finest landmarked cooperatives in the area.The South and East exposures in this wonderfully laid out three bed/three bath home allow natural sunlight to radiate throughout. The gracious foyer and gallery welcome you into this pristine prewar apartment. The expansive living room make this classic six seamless for entertaining. Elaborate Prewar details abound throughout including 9ft. high beamed ceilings and restored oak hardwood floors. Oversized casement windows allow for natural sunlight to fill each room. The apartment offers thru wall air conditioning and custom built-in cabinets that were both added within the last year. The open, eat in kitchen has a breakfast bar and pass through to the dining room/den. The kitchen is complete with quartz counter tops, white tiled backsplash and stainless steel appliances. The generously proportioned living room offers a functioning wood-burning fireplace, decorative built-in shelving and crown molding. The Master Suite has double exposures, abundant closets and a very well-proportioned en-suite bath. The second and third bedrooms each have their own en-suite full bathroom and ample closet space with custom built ins. The Essex House is an elegant prewar elevator building with a full service 24 -hour doorman, central laundry room, bike room, live-in resident super, common courtyard and private storage. The building is pet friendly and pied-a-terre purchases are allowed.Located on a coveted tree-lined street, the Essex House is near various manicured parks and playgrounds, transportation options, Grand Central Station, the UN, theater district, and excellent shopping and fine dining options. **Buyer pays 2% flip tax. First showings will be at our Sunday open house on 6/18**

This Highly Sought After, X-Large 1BR/1.5Bth + Large Private Balcony. This Spacious, Loft-Like, North & East Facing Unit which offers Great Sunlight and Open City Views, also boasts Floor to Ceiling Windows w/ soaring 10ft Ceilings, Washer/Dryer in Unit, and Private Wall Safe in Unit. The Open, Windowed Chef's Kitchen Includes Granite Counter Tops, Sub-Zero Refrigerator, Bosch Stove & Oven, Bosch Dishwasher, Microwave, and Garbage Disposal. Pets Welcome.

BUILDING FEATURES - This Luxury Full Service Condominium features a 10,000 Square Foot, State of The Art, "Fifth Avenue Club" which includes Pool & Jacuzzi, Health Club, Coed Sauna, Massage Rooms, Yoga & Aerobics Facility, Children's Playroom, Terrace, and Lounge w/ Fireplace, Catering Center & Pool Table and Screening Room. Garage in Building. Enjoy Convenient living by being just minutes from Madison Square Park, Public Transportation with nearby subway lines which include the 6/B/D/F/M/N/Q /R/W, Fine Shops, Gourmet Restaurants & Top Supermarkets; including Fairway, H-Mart, Trader Joe's & Whole Foods.

Located in the bustling section of Flatbush near Brooklyn College this studio apartment is ready for its new owner. There is a modern kitchen and updated bath. Sunken living room / sleeping area and excellent closet space. The building is well maintained with live in super and central laundry. You have easy access to the 2 and 5 train as well as several express buses to Manhattan. Brooklyn College is at your doorstep as well as 2 new gyms, Blink Fitness and Retro fitness. Exceptionally low maintenance make this a great find.

Imagine admiring the spectacular sunsets over Three Mile Harbor from a spacious waterfront modern house. The property sits at the end of a very private and quiet street, and is bordered with the waterfront beach and nature preserve. The inviting two-story modern style house offers an open living room with floor-to-ceiling windows boasting water views and breathtaking sunsets, the glass doors leading onto a wrap-around deck. The adjacent dining area leads into a kitchen with sliding doors. The first floor also offers a bedroom with en-suite bathroom, additional powder room and wet bar. The second floor has four bedrooms and two bathrooms. Enjoy the privilege of the heated pool area, surrounded with tall vegetation offering privacy. The house sits on very quiet beach, making it ideal for swimming, kayaking or paddle boarding. Boat enthusiasts will appreciate proximity of several marinas and possibility of mooring right in front of the property on navigable water to Gardiner's Bay. Located ideally on the east side of Three Mile Harbor the property is conveniently close to several waterfront restaurants and shops and is just minutes to the village.

Designed by famed architect, Grosvenor Atterbury in 1901, this 33' wide townhouse features the privacy and exclusivity of a single family home while offering all the conveniences of a full service condominium. The interior design palate of neutral grays and creams has been beautifully executed and is effortlessly classic. From the breathtaking entrance foyer finished in Chambord Limestone & polished plaster, to the 5" wide white-oak planked floors throughout, the townhouse exudes sophistication. The massive chefs kitchen has Olympian White Danby Fleuri Stone countertops, and Olympian White Danby vein cut marble island and low luster white lacquer cabinetry. The kitchen has been outfitted with all top of the line appliances, such as Wolf range and oven, Sub-Zero refrigerator, freezer, and wine-cooler, Miele dishwasher, and Dornbrocht faucets. The townhouse features approximately 10,088 sq ft over four floors with both a private and public passenger elevator servicing each floor. There are currently 5 bedrooms and 5 full baths and 3 half baths. The parlor floor features over 12' ceilings with beautiful south facing floor to ceiling arched windows and there is a large private terrace off the first floor. There is no other townhouse/condominium in the city that can compare!

GREAT VIEW OF RIVER AND CITY !!! Corinthian Condominium, High Floor (52nd Floor) with Great City View and River View for this spacious alcove studio for sale!!! Full service luxury condo building with full time doorman and concierge. Outstanding luxurious grand lobby, lush landscaping and courtyard, spectacular architecture, the state of art health club with private outdoor running, jogging track - one of the best in the city - deck and fully sized swimming pool, hot tub, sauna, steam room, on site parking garage, on site dry cleaner and laundry facility !!!

Corner unit loft-like studio in the heart of the Upper East Side - half a block to the new Q train!This low maintenance apartment features excellent closet space, sparkling hardwood floors, and Northern exposure. Separate pass-through kitchen has stainless steel appliances, including a dishwasher. 330 East 83rd Street has a part-time doorman Monday-Friday, 2-10 PM, a live-in super, and laundry. Additional storage is available. Enjoy excellent restaurants, shopping, proximity to Central Park, the East River Promenade, and Carl Schurz Park. This co-op allows for parents buying for children, pied-a-terres, gifting, and co purchasing. Subletting is allowed with board approval. Shareholder is required to live in unit for two years before subletting and may sublet two out of every four years. No pets allowed. No Flip Tax.

Wall of windows! Bright southern facing alcove studio - can easily be converted to a junior 1BR. This quiet alcove features an updated kitchen and bath and plenty of closet space, new air conditioner and window blinds. The Eastbrook is a full-service building with an updated lobby and elevators, Building Link notification system, an updated laundry and roof deck. The building has an amazing 24 hour staff, live-in super and is very pet friendly. Pied a terre's and co-purchasers are allowed. Sublets are permitted after 2 years of ownership. The Eastbrook is surrounded by great shopping --Citarella's, Agata & Valentina, Maison Keyser and Gracies Market and Cafe. The entire neighborhood is enjoying the benefits of the recently opened 2nd Avenue subway.. Welcome home!

Spacious and elegant corner prewar on one of the loveliest blocks of the Upper Westside! Quiet & bright with full southern exposure, this attractive home has a beautifully renovated windowed chef's kitchen, large open living/dining area with double exposures, original hardwood parquet flooring, 9' beamed ceilings and attractive built-ins. Enjoy a full sized bedroom with a wall of custom closets plus an additional fully fitted, oversized walk-in off the hallway. Bright-quiet-pristine, this home is loaded with charm and character. Boutique 1929 Co-op located in a top-notch Upper Westside neighborhood steps from Riverside Park, all transportation and a myriad of shops and services on upper Broadway. Elevator building. Pets welcome! Please note, the property has been virtually staged.

SPONSOR SALE!

Very spacious King Sized 1-bedroom in full-service doorman building in the heart of the Upper East Side! Washer dryer permitted with board approval as well!

This great home has quiet exposure over the shared courtyard of its sister building. The kitchen and bath are in move-in condition. The apartment has exceptional walk-in closet and storage. Washer/dryer is allowed in the apartment with board approval. Please also note the incredibly low monthly maintenance! The tax deductibility is also an attractive 60% (approximately).

Owners at 340 East 80th Street enjoy 24-hour doorman service, garage, fitness center, outdoor courtyard with children's playground, and live-in Superintendent. There is a bright central laundry room as well.

Convenient and established neighborhood has many supermarkets nearby including Fairway and Agata and Valentina, countless restaurants and shopping. Central Park and the Metropolitan Museum are directly to the West, and Carl Schurz Park is moments to the East.

There is also cross-town bus service at the corner of 79th Street and the brand new Second Avenue Subway at both East 86th and East 72nd Streets. The 6-train is a few blocks away, too.

Parents buying for children, gifting and guarantors allowed, subject to board approval.

Move right into this lovely floor through one bedroom home with windows and light from two exposures offering beautiful Chrysler Building and leafy green treetop views! This impressive, bright, apartment is ideally situated in a well-run, supremely attentive 24 hour doorman building in Turtle Bay. This home has it all: kitchen with ample cabinetry and countertops; an oversized living room with adjacent dining area, perfect for easy living and entertaining; a bath with pedestal sink and soaking tub; king sized bedroom overlooking pin drop quiet gardens, closets galore, and gleaming oak floors throughout. If a super-prime location (near Whole Foods, East River walk/bike paths, restaurants and transportation) is a must, and a crisp, clean, fresh, inviting home in a well-served, pet-friendly, building is a priority, then this ready-to-move-right-in residence is a must-see! Lounge on the beautiful rooftop garden with panoramic views of NYC! This is East Side Bliss! Sorry no guarantors or co purchasing.

OPEN HOUSE: October 15, 2017...MAJOR PRICE REDUCTION....Bright, Large, Convertible 3 Bedroom (or 2 Bedroom with Dining Room) cooperative apartment with southern exposures and open city views with 2 Full bathrooms in the Sutton East a post-war building. Upon entry from the foyer you have an expansive Living room with a wall of windows. Large and generous closet sizes throughout. The building features an new updated lobby, a 24 hour doorman, resident manager, bike room, roof deck, garage and is pet friendly. Co-purchasing is allowed.

Lovely one bedroom, one bath with north east exposure and partial view of Jackie Robinson Park. The apartment has a renovated galley kitchen design with original cabinets. The bathroom is also renovated with new fixtures. The natural light and wood flooring throughout the apartment offers warmth to the space. The building has a 24 hour concierge and doorman, elevator, laundry room facility, garage, storage space and bike room. Public Transportation: A,C, B, and D subway trains will get you to midtown in approximately 22 minutes. The IRT number 1 train is accessible on Broadway. There is also the cross town Bx19 and M3 bus as an alternative to the subway. The building was built in the 1950's and has a nice lobby area with 14 floors with three towers totally 236 units. The apartment is ideal for a first time buyer or an established professional looking for a easier commute to downtown or a buyer interested in subletting after two years of residence. No matter what is your reason to live at Hillview Towers you will love this new home and will enjoy living in Historic Hamilton Heights. An established community offering Starbucks, Bank of America, Capital One, New York Sports Club, Food Town, Riverbank Recreation Center, trendy restaurants and more. Call for a showing appointment today!!

Jaw-dropping river views from all rooms of this triple-mint elegantly appointed 2 bedroom, 2 bath Sutton Place home. This unique apartment features an airy open living room, dining room, kitchen layout perfect for entertaining and easy living. The top of the line kitchen features Wolf, Subzero and Miele appliances including a built-in wine fridge with a beautiful granite island opening to the spacious sun-flooded living room, dining area. The king-sized master suite offers serene river views, spacious closets and an en-suite master bathroom. The versatile second bedroom features custom built-ins and ample space for living. A bonus sunroom offers a tranquil place to enjoy the stunning river views. Add to this a WASHER DRYER, new gorgeous hardwood floors, and tons of storage. This highly sought after white glove, Sutton Place building features full-time doorman, attended elevator, resident manager, roof deck, gym, bike room and on-site garage. NO DOGS.

Sweeping East River Views from this Expansive Classic Six on Sutton Place.
Two bedrooms, three and a half bathrooms, plus a dining room and maid's room, make this apartment extremely spacious. The wide open East River view adds amazing light and a great focal point to this beautiful home.
Apartment 7C at 35 Sutton place is in move in condition. Your expansive living room has floor to ceiling bay windows looking across the East River to the newly developed Cornell Campus on Roosevelt Island. Plus, views span from the Triboro bridge to the North, all the way to the Williamsburg Bridge in the South, including the fabulous Downtown Brooklyn Skyline. An Asko washer and Bosch dryer in the unit make for even more comfortable living.
The eat-in kitchen has room to both cook meals, and enjoy them. A window in the kitchen adds natural light. Bosch, SubZero, and Frigidare stainless steel appliances make this a sharp looking high-end large kitchen.
The maids room has it's own en-suite windowed bathroom.
The master has the same bright and open Eastern views as the living room, a walk in closet, more than enough room for a king size bed and furniture, as well as it's own en-suite bathroom with it's own window.
The second bedroom also has a windowed en-suite bathroom.
Apartment 7C comes with its own storage area included with the apartment.
35 Sutton Place is a premier white glove luxury co-op on the East Side. 24-hour doorman and concierge, attended elevators, and a resident manager make living extremely comfortable at 35 Sutton Place. A beautiful roof deck was recently added to the common amenities at 35 Sutton Place. The building has a laundry room, courtyard, gym, and bike room. Parking is also available in the building for an additional fee. Whole Foods and other great stores are conveniently located nearby.

Enormous mint condition three bedroom, three full bath condominium loft with towering ceilings, huge open kitchen, fireplace, central air conditioning, large separate mud room with full-size side by side washer/dryer and broad southern exposure with amazing light throughout the day. This home was recently renovated leaving no stone unturned, using the finest materials. As soon as you enter you'll be captivated by the broad scale of the living room, incredibly high ceilings, interesting columns, large windows and wide plank reclaimed wood floors. The open kitchen features stone counters, custom cabinets, farmhouse sink and stainless steel appliances. A gallery leads to large large bedrooms, including a king-sized master with walk-thru dressing room, and five piece spa-like mater bath. Secondary bedrooms are equally large. Best of all this home is pin-drop quiet. Also available is a separately deeded parking space large enough for three separate vehicles asking $650,000. Located right in the middle of Tribeca on N Moore between Varick and Hudson, some of the best restaurants in the world are right downstairs.

Extremely rare 1,850-square-foot three-bedroom penthouse with a private, corner 678-square-foot terrace at the Village Pointe Condominium (350 West 14th Street). Located at the nexus of the West Village, Meatpacking District, and Chelsea, this penthouse is in one of the most prime locations Downtown.

In triple-mint condition, this duplex penthouse features open northern and western exposures with excellent light. The first floor includes an open-concept living and dining area, a chef's kitchen, a full bathroom and a powder room, and a home office/guest suite. A full third bedroom could be added into the area of living and dining room.

The second floor features the master suite and the large private, planted terrace with sweeping views. The master bedroom suite has a huge walk-in closet and an ensuite bathroom with dual vanities. Off of the master suite is an additional half bathroom with a washer/dryer and its own adjoining closet.

The Village Pointe is a pet-friendly brick elevator condominium building with a superintendent and laundry room. It is surrounded by the High Line Elevated Park, Chelsea Market, Gansevoort Market, Pier 57 Park, the new Renzo Piano-designed Whitney Museum, and the other world-famous cultural amenities, shopping, and dining of the West Village, Meatpacking, and Chelsea.

The building is proximate to the New York City Subway A/C/E, L, and 1/2/3 Lines.

This is a must see apartment, the photos do NOT do #32H justice. Boasting gorgeous unobstructed city views as well as peaceful Hudson River views, this king sized 1 bedroom is situated in a full service building with almost every desired amenity. Centrally located, World Wide Tower is near 10 transit lines (C,E / N,R,W / 1 / B,D,F,M and 4 bus routes (M20 and M104 at 8th Ave; M11 at 9th Ave; M50 crosstown bus).

This high floor, corner unit condo is flooded with sunlight and offers low monthly charges ($767 CC, $898 TX). Entertain guests while taking advantage of the open kitchen, equipped with a breakfast bar, a dishwasher and ample cabinet space.

The Residences at Worldwide Plaza is a full service white glove condominium ideally located in the heart of Manhattan's vibrant theater district. Through lobby you'll have access to a massive 40,000 sq ft fitness center and a 25m pool at TMPL Gym that includes virtual reality spin classes, personal trainers, large studio classes, a steam room, a sauna and a juice bar.

Right outside in the building's courtyard you'll enjoy Starbucks, Blockheads, Mother Burger and a handful of other restaurants. Nearby neighborhood highlights including the MoMA, Carnegie Hall, Whole Foods, Central Park, Rockefeller Center and Major shopping at Columbus Circle Mall.

Other Building features:
-24-hour Doorman & Concierge
-TMPL GYM (https://www.tmplgym.com)
-Onsite parking garage
-Eight laundry rooms
-Private garden courtyard
- Live In Super
- Resident Manager
- Roof deck with beautiful open views

Located in the Lumiere, the prized boutique luxury condominium in the heart of midtown west, this rarely available two bedroom two bathroom loft offers private terraces on both sides of the home. With its highly sought after winged bedroom layout, approximately 10-foot ceilings, beautiful blonde bamboo floors, and state-of-the-art finishes, this home is a sanctuary of serenity and luxury. The south-facing floor-to-ceiling windows offset a large, private terrace that runs the entire length of the master bedroom. The master offers a luxurious en-suite, spa-level bathroom equipped with a double vessel sink, glass stall shower, and a Kohler deep soaking tub for two. The second bedroom provides access to another, equally well-appointed bathroom. The open kitchen showcases high-quality design including custom ebony Wenge cabinetry, thick Calacatta slab marble countertops, and stainless steel appliances and fixture. The home is equipped with self-contained three zone central heat and air conditioning, a Bosch washer/dryer, and pre-wiring for an audio-visual system. The home is filled with brilliant sunlight, and provides partial views of midtown and beyond. Finally, a private storage unit is conveyed with the sale. The Lumiere is a full-service boutique condominium with a 24-hour doorman, resident super, a fingerprint-access gym, bike room, an electronically locked package/delivery closet, and Fresh Direct cold storage in lobby.

XXX MINT + UNOBSTRUCTED OPEN CITY VIEWS + LOCATION = YOUR NEW HOME!

Gut renovated 1 bedroom / 1 bathroom co-op with stunning North/West views in one of the most sky scraping hi-rise buildings on the Upper East Side, The Fontaine.

This apartment features a beautiful renovation with recessed lighting throughout, new floors, stainless steel appliances including a Sub Zero refrigerator and a Bosch Dishwasher, new Air Conditioning units, a spa-like bathroom and stunning city views from EVERY room.

The building amenities include, Full Time doorman, Porters, Laundry Room, Gym, Bike Storage, and a Finished Roof Top with stunning views of Manhattan.

Sublets, Pied A Terres, and Pets Allowed! Easy commute with new 2nd Avenue Q subway line!

Country Living Close to All, Unique Opportunity in Briarcliff Manor.. Colonial Farmhouse on 4 Park Like Acres with Mature Trees & Plantings.. Circular Driveway Entrance, Inviting Porch & Entry Foyer with Coat Closet & Powder Room.. Sitting Room with Fireplace & Eat in Kitchen with Plenty of Cabinet's & Counter Space, Pantry & Service Entrance Hall with Laundry & Garage Access.. Formal Dining Room & Spacious Living Room with Fireplace & French Doors Out to Front & Rear Porches .. Den /Office with Walkout to Grounds.. 4 Bedrooms, 2 with Private Balconies Offering Expansive Views.. Master Bedroom with Fireplace and Master Bath, Hall Bath, Large Cedar Closet & Attic Storage.. Barn with 2 Horse Stalls, Wash Stall, Tack Room and loft, 2 Paddocks.. Root Cellar and Pump House.. Adjacent to the 235 Acre Hardscrabble Wilderness Preserve with Hiking, Camping & Mountain Biking.. Convenient to the Villages of Briarcliff & Pleasantville.. Quick Access to Major Highway's & Train's.. Easy NYC Commute.

Located in Melrose section of the south-west Bronx, offered is a well maintained 2 family house, built in 1899+/-, that has been in the current family for almost 5 decades. It is comprised of a 3 bedroom apartment (2 bedroom, study and nursery) over a 2 bedroom apartment having access to the rear yard. The full finished basement has a separate entrance from the front and cellar doors in the rear. Each apartment has: 10'+/- ceilings, a windowed eat-in kitchen, a windowed full bathroom and a washer/dryer hook up. Rents include heat & hot water. The house is gated and comes equipped with a DVR video surveillance system having 7 cameras located in and around the house. 6,708+/- SF of available air rights makes this a development opportunity! Close to all!! Walk to the BX41 bus at Melrose Ave & E158th St, the BX6-SBS & BX6 buses at E161 St & Melrose Ave and the BX21 bus at 3rd Ave & E158th St. A short walk to Yankee Stadium for the B, D & 4 trains at E161st St, the Melrose Metro-North railroad Harlem Line at E162nd St & Park Ave, the 2 & 5 trains as well as shops at 3rd Ave & E149th Street "The Hub", Lincoln Hospital at E149th St & Park Ave and the Bronx Terminal Market (Gateway Mall) at E149th and Exterior Streets. Easy access to the Major Deegan and Bruckner Expressway.

Turn key three bedroom, two bath home - be in for summer. The main house has a lovely eat in kitchen with breakfast nook, large bright living room, two bedrooms and one bath. A renovated separate space has a kitchenette, living area, large bedroom a full bath. A perfect mother daughter. Won't last at this price!!

The time is now to buy this lovely home with community beach access. Beautiful two bedroom, one large bath main home with separate guest living space with bath. Hardwood floors throughout, detached 1.5 car garage, rear patio, professional landscaped property, water view, close to beach.

Tucked away in a secret mews is this triple mint two bedroom two bath loft with wood-burning fireplace, central-air conditioning, beamed ceilings, private washer dryer and exposed brick. As you walk into your welcoming entry foyer, you're led into a large corner living room facing south-west. An enormous open kitchen has stone counters, custom cabinets, integrated appliances and externally vented professional-grade range. Sliding glass door open onto a Juliet balcony overlooking neighboring gardens. The large master bedroom has custom closets and a stunning ensuite master bath. A generous second bedroom is perfect for children, guests or a home office. 37B Crosby is a well maintained boutique building that will make you feel like you've stepped back in time. Residents have private storage and all the convenience of being in the middle of SoHo with none of the noise. Whole Foods is minutes away. Nearby trains include the 6/N/R/W/Q/B/D/F/M.

The Apthorp is to New York City what the Pitti Palace is to Florence; a breathtaking icon steeped in architectural history and magnificent details. One of the few buildings in the city to sit on an entire city block, from 78th to 79th and Broadway to West End, it was added to the National Register of Historical Places in 1978. A large landscaped courtyard enables residents to drive through the porte-cochere, passed the guardhouse, and be dropped off inside the park-like privacy unlike any other residence in the city.

Incredible scale, history and exacting standards come together in this generous three bedroom with three full and one half bath fit for diplomats, celebrities and families alike. Twenty-four hour staff including full-time doorman, live-in superintendent and porters provide unrivaled service. The just completed renovation incorporated the finest materials and restoration of period details including custom baseboard and crown moldings, chevron pattern inlaid oak floors, eight foot solid core paneled doors, marble mantels, decorative ceilings and tasteful marble baths, central air-conditioning and private laundry.

Enter into a large foyer and be led into the ballroom-like living room with its high ceilings, decorative fireplace, huge windows and western exposure with incredible light pouring in throughout the day. Host events or intimate gatherings and make a seamless transition into your adjacent formal dining room large enough to comfortably seat twelve.

Chef's will delight in the perfectly appointed separate eat-in kitchen with custom cabinets, stone counters and stainless steel integrated appliances.

An enormous master suite with another decorative fireplace is so big will make you think you've moved to the suburbs. The five piece master bath features side by side vanity, separate soaking tub and shower. An enormous walk-in closet is the piece de resistance. The second and third bedrooms are both extremely generous.

The home enjoys ample storage throughout additional coat, linen, and cleaning closets, and has a stacked washer/dryer, central air, and true Nordic Ash flooring.

Loft 25 is a full service condominium with 24 hour doorman and live-in super, with amenities including gym, screening room, garden courtyard, and 5,000 square foot roof deck with grills and an outdoor shower. Central to the new West Side, the building is a stone's throw from central Chelsea's grocery stores such as Whole Foods and Trader Joes, and transportation on the C, E and 1 trains. Further West, you are immediately greeted by the High Line and new Hudson Yards district, with galleries, new parks and restaurants, and shopping at your fingertips.

GORGEOUS CONDO PRE-WAR.
Dramatic, sun-splashed loft duplex, 1 bedroom and 1 bathroom, fitted with great closets on a beautiful condo at the heart of West Village.
This elegant home redesigned and perfectly combined. On the quiet upper level reside the bedroom with generous closet. This loft style unit includes a double-height living room and approx. 15' ceilings high with over-sized new windows.
Stunning open views of the city, St. Lukes Place and James J. Walker Park. The Iconic Printing House was built in 1911, is a full service Condominium recently re-imagined by design firm. The building is offering residents a host of amenities including: A full-time doorman-Concierge, On-site valet service and On-site laundry facilities.
Completing this gracious home is a convenient access to the flagship Printing House Equinox gym with pool on the roof located within the building.The Printing House is located in the best West Village location with easy access to food shopping: Brooklyn Fair, D'Agostinho, Citeralla; and uncountable amazing restaurants. Near Subway line 1 and A/B/C/E,F and M.

Welcome Home! After a day of conquering Manhattan, arriving home to this beautiful spacious THREE bedroom PREWAR CONDO just steps from Central Park will be a delight in every way. Currently configured as a four bedroom, this amazing space can be transformed two bedrooms plus master suite and is a wonderful space with a stylish character uniquely its own. Entertaining is seamless and stylish in the inviting spacious sunken living room with custom built-ins. The impeccably designed open plan chef's kitchen is a masterful work of art. The kitchen includes custom cabinetry, granite countertops, breakfast bar, stainless steel premium appliances, Fisher & Paykel refrigerator, Viking stove, double drawer dishwasher and under counter wine refrigerator. The adjacent windowed dining room comfortably seats 6-8. Enjoying an ideal split bedroom layout, relax and unwind in the tranquil master bedroom which enjoys leafy green treetop views and two large closets and can easily be combined with the adjacent room into a huge master suite. Two more comfortable bedrooms round out this stylish stunner, one of which enjoys an ensuite windowed bath. A welcoming foyer, crown and baseboard moldings, gleaming light oak floors, ALL California closets, state of the art surround sound system. A laundry room with Bosch washer and dryer complete this special residence. In this prime Central Park location, 425 Central Park West is a boutique condominium offering a part-time doorman, supremely attentive super, porter, Fitness room equipped with Technogym equipment, storage and bike room. Very Low monthly carrying costs and pet friendly too. Walk to Whole Foods and the B and C subways just on the corner. Great INVESTMENT opportunity. Call today, this Central Park beauty will not last!

Be the first to see this gorgeous few year old East Village Condo near the Tompkins square Park. *Elevator* *Private Balcony* *Shared Roof Deck* *Private Storage Space* Apartment features sleek concrete floors with epoxy finishes and floor to ceiling double pane windows. Custom chefs kitchen with walnut veneer and satin lacquer cabinetry, Caesar stone countertops, back painted glass, Fisher and Paykel stainless steel appliances. Gorgeous bathroom with a deep soaking tub, custom built vanity, glass enclosed frameless shower and Duravit & Kohler fixtures.

Now is your opportunity to own a wonderful West End Avenue Penthouse duplex in a 19th Century Beaux Arts Co-Op. This renovated apartment with an open-concept main floor is designed for comfortable living and entertaining. As you enter this warm and inviting home you are greeted by the spaciousness of the living and dining with wood-burning fireplace, 9.5' ceilings, exposed brick wall and original plank flooring; a kitchen with high end appliances, large island with granite counter tops, and cherry wood cabinets. Continue the ambiance directly above while you dine and relax alfresco on the large private terrace with an additional storage closet. This home also includes two large main level bedrooms with 1 bath and an upstairs master bedroom suite including a walk-in closet, an en-suite marble bath, honed granite double sink vanity, spa tub, Hudson River views and a private all-season sun room adjacent to the larger outdoor terrace. There is additional, well thought out storage for all the extras. A 1/2 bathroom addition on the first level may be possible with board approval. This duplex penthouse home is sure to meet all of your expectations, while enjoying bright eastern and western exposures, open views and the convenience of being located on one of the city's best Upper West Side blocks right in heart of a sought-after, vibrant residential neighborhood - - near Riverside and Central Parks, transportation, restaurants, shopping (Zabar's, Fairway, Citarella and West Side Market) 425 WEA is a boutique, 7 story, 28 unit, friendly co-op with video security, a live-in superintendent (who receives packages), laundry on each floor and bike room. Bring offers!

PRICE REDUCTION: A chance to own on the terrace!!! Massive five story townhouse on Hamilton Terrace in the Hamilton Heights historic district. 19 feet wide, the stately limestone and terracotta brick façade of this beauty foretells the grandeur and endless space inside, over 5,000 feet of living space. Six bedrooms of grand proportions and abundant light. The windows in the front bedrooms span floor to ceiling. The back bedrooms, all adjoined by a wide extension, offer additional space for a study, play room or art studio. Plenty of room to get lost in! The house is full of large closets and dressing rooms. Space and more space. A magnificent winding staircase winds its way up beneath a large sky light. Other original details include fireplace mantles, hardwood floors, stained glass and French doors which lead into the parlor. The parlor flows right into a modernized kitchen. And the forty foot kitchen flows through more French doors out onto the patio. The lovely patio is high on a hill and offers unobstructed views. Six bedrooms, 4 and ½ baths. The garden level needs a full renovation. Some bathrooms need updating. The Certificate of non-harassment is in place. This property has endless space and endless possibilities.

This fully renovated gracious contemporary 4 bedroom, 3.5 bath home is ideally situated in exclusive Georgica Estates, East Hampton's only condominium community of freestanding homes. Close proximity to both the village and ocean, this unique 40 acre property features a heated gunite pool, two all-weather tennis courts and lush, beautifully landscaped grounds, all impeccably maintained by the homeowners' association. The house has a dramatic open plan living and dining area, complete with soaring cathedral ceiling and a wood-burning fireplace. It opens onto a patio for enjoying outdoor dining and lounging on chaises. A first floor master suite has a bath with two sinks, stall shower and large tub. Upstairs bedrooms and bath are spacious and sun-filled.The gourmet kitchen leads to a patio with in-ground propane connection for easy year-round barbecuing. Attached garage makes for easy packing and unloading of groceries. Combining privacy and community in the heart of East Hampton!

Situated on 1.65 oceanfront acres with endless ocean and bay views replete with refreshing breezes, this spacious 5 bedroom, 6 bath retreat offers an abundance of amenities inside and out for you and your guests! Upon entering, you are instantaneously welcomed by the open floorplan with kitchen, living & dining areas where the interior seamlessly transitions to the outdoors with oversized windows giving way to truly spectacular views. The custom staircase doubles as a work of art as it elegantly leads you upstairs to the spacious guest rooms, study, balconies and of course the luxurious master suite! Outdoors, relax by the heated gunite pool, enjoy the 139' of private & pristine oceanfront or entertain on the spacious patio. Any way you look at it, 43 Dune Road, East Quogue is not to be missed!

Closings to begin late Fall 2017
Sales office located at 438 East 12th Street, entrance on 11th Street.

This 1,686 square foot three-bedroom, two and a half bath residence designed by Paris Forino offers ceilings up to 10'7 and 1500 square feet of private outdoor space. Oversized casement windows framed in statuary bronze offer sun-filled eastern and western exposures. Designed for entertaining, the spacious living and dining area open up onto the enormous 1,500 square foot terrace featuring outdoor cabinetry with a built-in gas barbecue grill and custom landscaping. Exceptional interior features include seven-inch-wide plank European white oak flooring, 8' high interior doors with burnished brass hardware and custom architectural millwork throughout. Satin lacquer custom Italian cabinetry, limestone and Calacatta marble countertops and blackened metal hardware compose the expertly crafted open kitchen equipped with appliances by Wolf, Bosch and Sub-Zero. The master suite is a true sanctuary with an en-suite master bath highlighted by luminous design details. The serene space features herringbone Bianco Dolomiti mosaic floors complemented by the luxury of radiant heat, and Bianco Dolomiti-clad walls. A custom white lacquer Italian vanity cabinet with blackened metal accents and ample storage is topped by stunning Calacatta Ice marble. The second bath is finished with Bianco Carrara honed marble mosaic walls and floor, a Corbata Nero marble framed vanity mirror and a cerused white oak Italian vanity topped by Bianco Dolomiti. The dramatic powder room design offers watercolor glazed penny round mosaic walls, custom lighting and a corner-wrapping vanity mirror. A utility closet with washer/dryer completes this brilliantly-designed residence.

A private retreat in the East Village, Steiner East Village offers 82 residences ranging from one to four-bedroom condominiums and penthouses in New York's most eclectic, intriguing and authentic neighborhood. Developed by Steiner NYC, Steiner East Village is a partnership of sought after talents in architecture and design, with residential interiors and amenities by Paris Forino Interior Design, architecture by S9 Architects and landscape architecture by Future Green Studio. This full-service condominium will feature dual marquee entrances on 11th and 12th Streets, with a 24-hour concierge and live-in resident manager. Residents will experience over 16,000 square feet of indoor and outdoor amenities including a teak-ribbed indoor pool overlooking a private park-like garden, spa sanctuary with steam and sauna, 2,000 square foot state-of-the-art fitness center programmed by FitLore Health and Wellness, resident's library with fireplace and a children's playroom. Private outdoor spaces include an over 5,000 square foot rooftop park and 3,000 square foot resident courtyard.

Closings to begin late Fall 2017
Sales office located at 438 East 12th Street, entrance on 11th Street.
