Charming Jr. one bedroom on a beautiful tree-lined block. Renovated kitchen, updated bathroom and hardwood floors. Spacious living space with enough space to put dining table. Great closet space. Facing north, very quiet. Well maintained elevator building. Steps from Carl Schurz Park, many great restaurants and gourmet store Agata & Valentina. Tenant in place until January 2018. Parents buying with children/co-applicants, guarantors and pied-a-terre allowed. Cats allowed, sorry no dogs.

Spacious Cedar Shake Ranch, 3 Bedroom, 2 Baths, Large Master Suite, South Of Hwy, Distant Bay View With Mooring Rites, Oak Wood Floors, Stone Fireplace, Open Country-Style Kitchen With Maple Cabinets & Breakfast Island. Open Floor Plan Vaulted Ceiling Great Room With Beam Ceiling. Attached Garage, Full Large Basement & Large Wood Deck.

**FIRST OPEN HOUSE, SUNDAY, 10/22, 11-12PM** RARELY available 4 BED- 3.5 BATH, Limestone Townhouse in Bay Ridge's prestigious and Historic "Doctors Row". This classic limestone represents timeless pre-war elegance and style. It includes details such as high ceilings, original, detailed woodwork and beautifully treated original hardwood floors throughout. This exquisite home features spacious bedrooms, 3 full baths, a bear claw tub and an additional half-bath powder room off the Parlor level. Expansive sun-drenched living room with its staple Bay Windows facing out onto the serene front garden. Featuring a Library/Den room with deco fireplace, a massive eat-in kitchen with updated finishes. Intricately designed and meticulously upkept Presidential dining/family room with exquisite original woodwork, beamed ceilings, and an elegant decorative fireplace! Additional features include Central Air throughout, Sky-lights with original stained glass casings, Washer/dryer, and more. This original limestone townhouse is further accented by a beautifully landscaped front patio garden, and a serene private backyard and garden! **Basement level with Private entrance floor legally permitted for Doctors office use. Available approx. 900 sq ft windowed basement w/ high 8 ft ceilings with designated bath and kitchenette. All the beauty, tranquility, and charming history of Brooklyn right at your door step! Bay Ridge features an array of cozy diners, spacious parks and laid-back bars. Close to 5th avenue shops, restaurants, and entertainment, this home is conveniently located around the corner from the 77th R Train Station and B4, B70, B63 bus stops.

Mint Sutton Prewar Gem! Spacious and elegant, traditional 6 room, 3 bedroom 2 bath condominium, completely renovated and thoughtfully reconfigured in 2000 to create more gracious living space. The impeccable work of renowned architect Dimitris Balamotis resulted in a stunning ambience and unique exclusive floorplan not found anywhere else in the building. All wiring, plaster work and flooring were redone, and the quality of the finishes incorporated is exceptional. In 2010, famed and well-published interior designer Bjorn Bjornsson redecorated the entire home to perfection.

The welcoming entrance gallery, generous room proportions, high ceilings and gleaming dark hardwood floors are in keeping with the style the city's grandest apartments. Windows in every room invite in lovely sunlight from southern and eastern exposures. Among the other distinguishing features are custom designer paintwork, custom blinds on all windows, custom shutters in the kitchen and baths, lighting for art in the foyer, living room and library, a washer-dryer and 2-zone air conditioning.

Entertain in the large living room around the wood-burning fireplace and enjoy formal meals in the dining room that seats up to 10 guests. The chef will be inspired in the beautiful windowed kitchen equipped with stainless steel appliances and plentiful storage.

The master suite is exquisite, with decorative mirrored walls, a sizable walk-in closet/dressing room and stylish limestone bath. The second bedroom, currently used as a library with custom lit built-in bookcases, and the third bedroom share a refined limestone bath with a custom Macassar Ebony vanity. A large storage bin comes with the apartment.

Located in Manhattan's prized Sutton Place by the East River, 444 East 57th St. is an intimate white-glove prewar condominium with a vaulted marble lobby, 24-hour doorman, elevator attendant and live-in super. Built in 1929, this handsome building has been home to many high-profile residents, and is minutes from the UN, 57th Street thoroughfare, Whole Foods, shops, restaurants and transportation. Pets, pied-a-terres, LLC and trust ownership is allowed. Co Exclusive

Entry Level
Designed for grand entertaining and breathtaking views, this 6,387 sq. ft., 4-story home (4,412 interior sq. ft and 1,975 sq. ft exterior) is known for its Midtown brilliance. As you walk into the grand entry foyer of this apartment, you are greeted with custom brass stairway banisters, a private elevator and elegant furnishings, setting the stage for the beauty before you.

Floor One
The main floor establishes the attention to detail that is present throughout this exquisite home. As you step into the living room, sunlight streams through the space from the floor to ceiling windows and you instinctively admire the garden outside on the terrace. Solid Brazilian cherry wood floors, a detailed Mahogany accent wall, high-definition projector and screen, as well as a custom built bar made with black lacquer and exquisite green marble are some of the features worth noting in this grand living space. The centerpiece of the inviting dining room is a French-Deco Mahogany table and leads to a Chef's dream kitchen expertly equipped with top of the line appliances, a custom wine fridge, Glassos counter tops and an oversized white marble island. Off of the kitchen, you can enjoy the private outdoor seating area and entertainment space.

Floor Two
This entire floor is designed as a master suite making this area hard to leave in the morning. The large sitting room connects the two sides of the floor creating a seamless flow from room to room. The expansive master bedroom offers an abundance of natural light and is surrounded by de Gournay gold-leafed hand painted wallpaper. The master bedroom also includes various oversized windows, a washer/dryer, ample custom closets and a powder room just steps from your bedside. As you walk through the sitting room admiring the cityscape through the windows, you are greeted to two large custom walk-in closets. With custom lighting, Sonos speakers, built-in shelves, wall-to-wall space for a dozen wardrobes or more and unparalleled views, this could be one of your favorite features in the apartment! The master bathroom is just beyond the walk-in closets and is of unmatched quality in the City. The centerpiece is an oversized soaking tub with skylight above and features custom Waterworks brass fixtures resembling a spa retreat. The bathroom incorporates dual marble sinks, Greenhouse ceilings, rain shower, white lacquered custom cabinets and hand-picked tile flooring. The bathroom terrace will surprise you with the refreshing resistance swimming pool and the Empire State Building views that seem almost touchable from the water's edge.

Floor Three and Four
The third floor has two dedicated outdoor terraces, a second master bedroom with an en-suite bathroom and balcony, as well a third bedroom currently purposed as a study. When you reach the third floor it reinforces how much thought and care went into this three year multi-million dollar renovation. The fun and lively décor flows perfectly as you navigate the apartment but each room has its own individual style and personality. The magic of this apartment is evident in all the consideration every detail has received. The top floor encompasses a petite powder room but is almost entirely devoted to the 1,000+ sq. ft. outdoor terrace. The sensational outdoor space is large enough to host a dinner party and features an outdoor bar, fire-pit perfect for breezy summer nights and the most dramatic Chrysler and Empire State Building views found in Midtown. Relish in the hours spent outdoors in the six outdoor terraces and two balconies as you take in the sweeping city views in this gem in the sky.

Bright! Open views! Location, Location, Location! This phenomenal +/- 3000 square foot Pre-War doorman 4 bedrooms, 3 bathroom residence is located a block from Central Park and The Metropolitan Museum. This home features large scale open and airy rooms, prewar details and vaulted ceilings just under 10 feet. There is a formal dining room, a chefs kitchen with pantry, a corner master bedroom plus additional large sized bedrooms and an office or nanny rooms. There is an abundance of closet space and laundry. This extremely bright home has South, East and North exposures. Perfect location, a phenomenal floor plan with grand scale rooms and beautiful turn of the century prewar details make this sunshine filled home and building a truly exceptional residence. 45 East 82nd Street is surrounded by many of the cities most sought after private schools and zoned for PS6! This stunning building sits among New York's finest restaurants, shopping, museums, galleries and Central Park. Storage bin included. Pets allowed.

Best Waterfront deal in East Hampton! Incredible opportunity to own an exceptional bayfront home on Gerard Drive. This charming beach cottage boasts over 2000 square feet of open living and exceptional panoramic views of Gardiners bay AND Accabonac Harbor! The 3-4 bedroom has 2 full bathrooms, 2 fireplaces, 1.5 car garage, 2 second floor walk out terraces, Sun room, reinforced Bulkhead and tranquil private beach. This turn - key value won't last so just bring your toothbrush and exhale at your new bayfront paradise.

Located close to Prospect Park, this newly renovated 1 bedroom is in excellent condition. New kitchen with all stainless appliances, updated bath, large living room and bedroom. Foyer can be used for dining or home office. The building has central laundry, on site super, common garden. Pets are welcome. Bike room and storage at additional charge.

A palatial corner condo perched near the top of the Cielo, this luminous 5-bedroom, 5.5-bathroom home boasts a collection of high-end finishes as well as stunning views of the East River, the Triborough Bridge, and the surrounding city skyline. Features of the home include gorgeous hardwood floors, expansive floor-to-ceiling windows, an in-unit washer/dryer with mud room and closets galore! The modern home starts with an open and airy entry foyer and flows into a massive living and dining room with direct river views. Beautifully renovated with industrial details, this sleek and sophisticated three bed, three bath corner home at the Caledonia boasts floor to ceiling windows providing extraordinary 360 degree of midtown, the Hudson River, downtown and beyond. The open format chef's kitchen has beautiful granite countertops and custom cabinetry and includes high-end appliances such as a SubZero refrigerator, Viking oven, Wolf stove, and Bosch dishwasher. Located in the midst of highly coveted West Chelsea, the Caledonia is moments from the best restaurants and nightlife in the Meatpacking district and West Village and is within striking distance of Hudson River Park's waterfront lawns and recreation spaces.

5 Bedrooms, 1.5 Bathrooms. Come home to this handsome, 5 bay, Federal-style, brick and stone residence topped with an elegant slate roof. Designed by noted architect Dwight James Baum, circa 1925, this lovely prewar home is filled with numerous Colonial Revival details. The property is lushly planted with verdant, mature gardens and a small terrace in the rear yard.Side-lights and an over-door fan light frame the charming entry into this solid home. The bright, main floor consists of a spacious living room with working fireplace, a formal dining room, a sunroom, kitchen and a guest powder room. Beautiful hardwood floors are framed with inlaid borders and there are many large, 6 over 6 pane windows throughout the house flooding it with light. A picturesque, rear porch is accessed from the main hall and is a few steps above the garden.The second floor contains the large master bedroom with French doors that open onto a private deck, two additional bedrooms and a full bath. The third floor features two additional bedrooms. The home contains abundant storage.A full basement with an attached garage completes this wonderful property. The property is accessible by MTA #1 Subway, Bus or 20 minute car ride to midtown Manhattan.The Fieldston neighborhood is one of New York City's most beautiful and well-planned early 20th Century suburban communities consisting of approximately 257 houses and related structures. The land comprising Fieldston was purchased by Joseph Delafield in 1829 as part of a larger estate. In 1909, a year after subway services reached 242nd Street and Broadway, the owners of the Delafield estate decided to develop the property by selling several acres to Manhattan Teachers College, with the rest to be a private park devoted exclusively to country homes.

The property is close to the Riverdale Country School and is just blocks from Horace Mann and Ethical Culture Fieldston School.

MOVE RIGHT IN. THIS IS THE BEST VALUE FOR SIZE, LOCATON AND QUALITY OF CONSTRUCTION ON THE UPPER EAST SIDE TODAY. Brand new, 20 foot wide 8,200 square foot elevator town house located between Park and Madison Avenues. A true Mott B. Schmidt classic, this home has just undergone a meticulous and complete renovation where no detail has been overlooked.

Clad in red brick, the exterior of the house features 14 oversized windows, a limestone cornice and a custom Charles Platt-inspired front gate. An elegant entry foyer paneled in Sapele-Mahogany and featuring radiant heat white Sivic marble floors sets the stage for this outstanding residence. Beyond, a custom designed chef's kitchen features high gloss mahogany cabinetry and wire glass inlay, Glassos countertops, Calacatta Nuvolato Marble backsplash and radiant heat floors. The impressive appliance suite includes a 6' Sub Zero dual refrigerator, Wolf 6 burner range/double oven, Miele warming drawer, Speed Oven and Nespresso coffee maker. A separate breakfast room with five oversized windows overlooking the house garden is located off the kitchen. The glorious and private rear garden boasts a bluestone patio, grand cedar trellis, cedar planters with a drip irrigation system and custom lighting and sound throughout. An exquisite powder room finished in Rosa Arroya & Thassos marble, mosaic mother of pearl flooring and adorned with Lalique lighting fixtures completes the first floor.

The second floor is an entertainer's dream with soaring 11.5' ceilings, grand proportions and bright light from the oversized Mahogany Weight & Chain windows by Zeluck of Brooklyn. The living room is finished with radiant heat white Sivic marble floors and features an oversized wood-burning fireplace with a white onyx, polished nickel and mahogany surround. Across the landing is a formal dining room complete with a coffered ceiling, herringbone mahogany floors, linear gas fireplace and a wet bar. Off the dining room is a Sapele mahogany wine lounge with capacity for 1,000 plus bottles, 2 Eurocave wine maturing cabinets and a Spanish cedar humidor. A powder room off the living room services the second floor.

The sumptuous master bedroom suite occupies the entire third floor and features 8 inch wide Sapele mahogany flooring, a barreled 11' ceiling with LED lighting and a linear gas fireplace. The master bath, featuring Fantini & THG fittings, is swathed in luxurious Thassos marble slab and offers radiant heat floors, a double sink vanity, an oversized steam shower, a 6' Toto Aimes Airbath bath tub with TV and a Toto Neorest commode. A stunning and artistic Sicis mosaic leaf mural inlay above the bath serves as a further indulgence. A separate dressing room, sitting room with a linear gas fireplace and a trellised private balcony completes the master floor.

The fourth and fifth floors of the home each offer two bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms. All bedrooms feature 8 inch wide Sapele mahogany flooring and a linear gas fireplace. Bathrooms feature radiant heat flooring and are finished in Glassos tile with Dornbracht and Lefroy Brooks fixtures. An additional washer and dryer are located off the fourth floor landing.

The fully finished basement features a recreational room, home gym, separate laundry room and two full bathrooms.

46 East 66th Street is the epitome of fine and modern living. State-of-the-art conveniences include Crestron's top-of-the-line centralized home technology offering residents full control of lighting, climate, audio, shades and security via in room iPad Controls throughout the home, video surveillance system, automated shades and Tannoy/Sonos integrated speakers throughout, central Electrolux vacuum system and for the ultimate in security, a backup full home Generac gas generator.

BEST CONDO VALUE IN CLINTON ($1375/sf)...Welcome home to this efficiently proportioned two (2) Bedroom plus home office/ 2.5 Bath home located at in the Hudson Hill Condominium. Quiet & bright studio home in fantastic Columbus Circle location. Features include 10' ceilings, windowed eat-in kitchen, three closets (one double depth), built-in murphy bed, and hardwood floors. Building features laundry, bike storage and storage area in the basement.

This sun filled 20 foot wide, 4 story renovated elevator brownstone is ideally situated in the heart of Carnegie Hill between Madison and Park Avenues. In excellent condition, this beautiful home features high ceilings, large windows and is centrally air conditioned throughout. An elegant and gated exterior entry forecourt sets the stage for this home. The garden floor features a formal entry vestibule and foyer, dining room and a large kitchen with center island and top of the line appliances, as well as a separate butler's pantry. The house is approximately 4600 SF above grade with an additional 1060 SF finished basement.

This 1,624 sq ft split two-bedroom, two-and-a-half-bath residence designed by Thomas Juul-Hansen offers spectacular north and west views of the Manhattan skyline through 10' floor-to-ceiling glass windows. A striking Mahogany entry door and seven-inch wide plank oak flooring leads from the foyer into an elegant living and dining concept seamlessly integrated with a center island chef's kitchen, sleek Madreperola Quartzite Stone countertops and backsplashes, antiqued brass finishes, custom cabinetry and Miele appliances. The north-facing master bedroom overlooking City Hall Park features ample closet space and a luxurious en-suite five-fixture master bath. The Honed Gascogne Blue Limestone-clad enclosed shower, water closet, oversized soaking tub and custom designed Chelsea Grey Limestone double vanity complete with medicine cabinets and lighting is complemented by Waterworks fixtures and Gioia Venatino Bow-Tie mosaic marble radiant heated marble floors. The secondary south-facing bedroom features an en-suite Bianco Dolomiti marble-clad bath with a custom designed Walnut wooden medicine cabinet, Shetland Grey Stone vanity top, radiant heated floors and Waterworks fixtures. The powder room boasts a custom Star White marble vanity and mirror, Stellar White marble flooring, a striking polished Bosco marble accent wall and Waterworks fixtures and accessories. A coat closet and Miele washer and dryer complete this elegant residence.

With over 10,000 ft. of living area, thislandmark property offers many versatile layout options with up to 6 living areas forformal and casual events, 6 double bedrooms, 8 complete bathrooms, and 6 fireplaces. Additionally, there is a staff Apt plus 1500 bottle wine cellar on the basement level. The location, the size and the quality of this immaculate triple mint property represent a modern scenario of outstanding appeal as it is ideally positioned just off Madison Avenue and a block from Central Park. This highly sought-after neighborhood also offers easy access to a daily discovery of great museums, galleries, shopping choices, restaurants and subways.

Striking Sugar Hill Semi-detached, 20 wide Townhouse with 30-foot frontage. One of a kind townhouse with a slate mansard roof, classic brick. Custom made wrought iron gates lead you into the side patio, which spills into an expansive Japanese garden with rare specimen flowers. The huge deck and modern extension prepare you for the remarkable interior. Classic soaring ceilings and archways combined with a gorgeous modern renovation make for a home of unusually grand proportions (almost 5,000sqft). Floor to ceiling windows provide abundant natural light. As do three splendid skylights. Other features include: a dramatic original staircase and a ultra-modern floating staircase, 3 working fireplaces, a large deck and 2nd fl balcony, a poggenpohl kitchen system with a radiant heat cork floor, Viking and Guggegau appliances, central air and security. All new systems - plumbing and electrical. Brand new roof and solar panels which provide an abatement for four years. Three family easily converted to one or two family, six large bedrooms, and four baths. The property was the residence of Arthur Mitchell, director of, the nearby, Dance Theatre of Harlem. Historic with a sleek modern finish. Rent roll on request. The stunning parlor duplex can be delivered vacant.

Now is your chance to come home to your beautiful alcove studio in super trendy Clinton! The apartment features Stainless Steel Appliances, Granite Countertops and hard wood imported cabinets. The bathroom is new and features heated floors! The building features a state of the art fitness center, a wonderfully appointed resident lounge and graciously landscaped out door area. There is 24 hour concierge and doorman assistance as well as a resident super in case of any emergency. Don't delay this is your chance to live in your own private urban oasis.

This rarely available and well thought out floorplan is beautifully finished with a split bedroom layout boasting three bathrooms. 3BC contains a pristine, stainless steel chef's kitchen, and is equipped with top of the line appliances including Viking stovetop and dishwasher, Bosch convection oven, and Subzero refrigeration. One arrives into an oversized great room that comfortably houses both living and dining areas. The living room has deep-set windows featuring Northern exposures through ten windows overlooking a bucolic block with treetop views provide a seamless experience of both exterior and interior living. The living room is perfect for entertaining and equipped with a dry bar, gracious dining area and open kitchen with a breakfast bar. The thoughtful floorplan also maximizes the privacy of the bedrooms. The master bedroom wing offers an en-suite bathroom, and over-sized, custom walk-in closet and dressing room. 520 East 72nd Street is a full-service co-op building on the Upper East Side nestled on a quiet, tree-lined cul-de-sac overlooking the East River. The building offers amenities that include a full-time doorman, live-in resident manager, laundry room, package room and bike room. Co-purchasers, guarantors and pied a terre buyers are welcome. The building is pet friendly. 520 East 72nd is conveniently located near major transportation including the new 2nd Avenue Q train, the 6,F and cross town bus.

*HDFC Income Restricted Studio - Cash Purchase Only*Extremely rare studio available for purchase on one of the more sought after tree-lined streets in West Harlem's historic Hamilton Heights/Sugar Hill neighborhood. This south facing, third floor apartment is located just steps from Riverside Park, trendy restaurants, cafes, retails stores, City College, Columbia University, and Columbia Presbyterian Hospital. The apartment is very bright and features 11ft+ high ceilings, a walk-in closet, original woodwork and a newly renovated windowed bathroom. The coop allows parent purchases and has very strong financials. HDFC 120% income level 2017 income for all working occupants is combined1 person=$80,160 2 people=$91,680 3 people people people people=$132,840

Fieldston Gardens is pre-war charm at its best! Centrally located next to Johnson Avenue for shopping and restaurants and next to buses too for easy commute to the subway, Metro North and Manhattan. This unique walk up top floor 3 Bedroom 2 Bathroom apartment offers the pre-war charm and space of times past!
Step into a large open foyer which leads to a sunny living room with wood burning fireplace. The living room adjoins to a large formal dining room which could easily be converted to an additional bedroom. The home features a spacious eat-in windowed kitchen with separate pantry and dumb waiter.
The apartment also features two large bedrooms, a renovated windowed bathroom, and a third bedroom with en-suite bathroom. This home has exposures to the North, South, and East. Ceiling heights of over 9 feet make the home feel even more spacious. This is truly a home that will allow you to enjoy peace and quiet.
The tudor styled building offers exquisite manicured gardens and a private garden across the street. Live in super, bike room, storage and laundry onsite. A separate storage unit is included with this apartment. Washer Dryer is allowed in the unit with approval.

Hudson River views from every room and from your private terrace, you will never close your draperies!This stunning PH loft has expansive views of sky, downtown, the Hudson River and the HighLine park from every room and is perched on the southwest corner of the building. The home rivals the best of current new developments in the immediate area at a fraction of the cost. A custom combination of two units, the space is intelligently designed, open and inviting; flowing perfectly for entertaining or peaceful times. A stunning hand-milled staircase rises from the loft up to your private landscaped roof terrace with outdoor stainless steel kitchen and the same south and west views of downtown landmarks and the Hudson river.The spacious 2 bedroom, 2 bath penthouse has an open layout spanning approximately 1755 sqft of exquisite interiors, including 7-inch white oak floors, expansive double-glazed insulated windows with custom shades and Vermont slate window sills. The chef's kitchen features a custom designed white oak and concrete island with double sink, restored steel cabinets from a prewar CPW landmark, concrete countertops, Siematic base cabinetry and pantry, Bertazzoni 4 burner stove with Miele hood, and Subzero refrigerator/freezer. The huge corner master suite has abundant walk-in closets, a gas fireplace, and a Master bathroom featuring an oversized, glass block shower, and custom marble floors with radiant heat.Your investment value will climb by sharing the block with two iconic High Line projects: Zaha Hadid's newest masterpiece and Isay Weinfeld's "Jardim". +Art, a modern, 13-story luxury condominium composed of 90 units, was constructed in 2009. Enjoy the cultural heart of downtown: art galleries, Michelin-rated restaurants, the celebrated High Line and upcoming Hudson Yards. Whole Foods coming in 2 blocks away. Building amenities include a 24-hour attended lobby, a live-in super, a state-of-the-art fitness center, a landscaped courtyard, and a professionally designed common roof terrace with wet bar and grill. Pied-a-terres and pets are welcome. 421A tax abatement in effect though 2021. Owner occupied and Immediate occupancy is possible.

Totally redone 2017 Colonial on quiet cul de sac with heated pool with natural waterfall and pool house. Extensive exterior decking, private setting. Large eat in kitchen with granite counter tops, stainless steel all new LG appliances. New boiler, well pump, central a/c. Large finished lower level. Over sized family room with tray ceiling, fireplace and french doors, adjacent to kitchen. Fireplaces in Living room, Family room and Master Bedroom. Huge Media room with double height ceiling. First floor office/den/bedroom. Some photos have been virtually staged.

Nestled in the heart of North Tribeca, this pristine and luxurious maisonette offers the privacy of townhouse living but with all the conveniences of a boutique luxury condominium. Sprawling over three levels, this impeccable 3,480SF residence offering 4 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms with private garden terrace has been meticulously and thoughtfully upgraded throughout. Enter through private street entrance to a voluminous great room with soaring 22-foot ceiling heights that are brightly illuminated by expansive floor-to-ceiling windows. Custom mill work complement the entryway and flank the center focal piece, a stunning gas fireplace covered with dramatic floor to ceiling travertine stone. The top of the line kitchen flows seamlessly from the living/dining area and features Poggenpohl cabinetry, Wolf, Miele and Subzero appliances. Completing this main level are three bedrooms, two full bathrooms and laundry room with ample storage space. A staircase leads to the upper level master suite, a secluded retreat perfect for relaxing and unwinding. A bright and airy open landing provides a gracious sitting area. Beyond double doors a beautiful bedroom awaits with custom built dressing area, vanity, enormous closet space and beautiful en-suite spa-like bathroom. A separate staircase leads to the lower level, the ultimate media/lounge room featuring extraordinary and rare double height ceilings, oversized windows, floor-to-ceiling custom library shelving, and access to the private landscaped garden. Currently used as a library, media area and kids play area, this large space is flexible and can be configured for many different uses. The 648SF garden space provides ample seating for dining, relaxing and a designated kids play zone. Exquisite finishings and fixtures throughout along with central heating and air conditioning complete this picture perfect turn-key home.

Built in 2010, The Fairchild is a boutique condominium located on the quaint cobblestone blocks of Vestry and Washington Streets in North Tribeca, offering a 24-hour attended lobby, private storage unit and bicycle storage. There is a 421-A tax abatement until June 30, 2021.

Come home to this exquisite 2-bedroom apartment atop a gorgeous pre-war renovated doorman building a half block from Central Park. This charming space features a fully renovated windowed eat-in kitchen with granite counters, custom cabinetry, a Sub-Zero refrigerator and a Bosch dishwasher. There is a windowed bathroom with marble floors and detailed subway tile throughout, as well as abundant closet space, high ceilings, and excellent sunlight throughout. Beautiful inlaid hardwood floors, pre-war detail throughout, and built in a/c complete the space.

The building features a 24-hour doorman, beautiful marble lobby, live-in super, laundry room, roof deck with spectacular views, common storage and a bike room. The B/C and express 1/2/3 trains are located one-two blocks away. All of this less than a block from the Park and two blocks from both the Whole Foods and the upcoming Trader Joe's! This is truly an unbeatable home!

New Development- South Facing and Bright Condo Loft Studio with soaring 10 foot ceilings perfectly located in the highly sought after Midtown West. This spacious apt features white oak hardwood flooring throughout and a wall of floor to ceiling windows that flood the residence with natural light throughout the day. The state of the art kitchen features a Silverstone quartz countertops, imported Italian cabinetry, Bertazzoni gas range and oven, integrated ultra quiet dishwasher and an integrated Liebherr refrigerator. The master bathroom features a deep soaking tub with handheld and rain-head shower fixtures, floating vanity and imported Italian porcelain tile. Other features include Individually-controlled central heating/cooling and Washer/Dryer in the apt. 540 WEST is a new full-service Condominium building with a modern glass and steel facade and a 421-A Tax Abatement in place. It's a unique and exclusive seven-floor, two-tower boutique building with an open central 6,000 square foot landscaped courtyard perfect for lounging, dining, open air movie viewing nights and even has a reflection pool connecting the North and South buildings. Amenities include a 24 Hour attended lobby with fireplace and intimate lounge, fitness center and two breathtaking landscaped roof decks with BBQ grills in addition to bicycle storage, a pet spa and so much more. Tenant in place, please allow 24 hour notice for showings.

Rarely available! Beautiful three bedroom with two full baths in a prewar masterpiece with very high ceilings, excellent light and space, oversized windows, and massive closets. Washer-dryer permitted in apartment! Bring your architect - this is a classic apartment with great bones and plenty of space. Full service building with live in super and full time doormen. Storage cage comes with apartment. Bike storage, fully equipped fitness room, and laundry room. Even in-building composting for the environmentally conscious! Pets are allowed. Large, well maintained roof deck offers stunning city views and sunsets. The marble and stained glass lobby is in mint condition, restored to its original splendor. The Rockfall is one of the architecturally significant and iconic Blum Brothers' masterpieces in the heart of the Morningside Heights Historic district, a leafy and serene enclave. Riverside, Morningside, and Central Parks are all minutes away. Your neighbors are prominent and visually-inspired institutions including Columbia University, Barnard College, Cathedral of St. John the Divine, the Jewish Theological Seminary, and Manhattan School of Music. An incredible variety of restaurants, cafes, food markets and shopping await you. Excellent bus and subway transportation include the 1 train (around the corner) and the B and C trains on Central Park West.

Large Living Space To Entertain Inside & Out, 3+ Bedrooms, Spacious Master Suite, 5 Full Baths, Covered Florida Room with Skylights & Electronic Sliding Shutters, Water Misting System, and Heaters.. Finished Basement, In-Law Suite, Full Bath And Walkout. Total Reno & Rebuilt Addition, Deed Bay Access Cormorant Point Beach, Adjacent To Town Land Preserve.

Priced to sell, this is the best priced and only east facing two bedroom available in the building. Perched on the 30th floor lies this chic, never lived in residence of 1,668 square feet, 2 bedrooms and 2.5 bathrooms.
When you enter the home, you are welcomed to a bright entrance foyer with captivating views of the Williamsburg Bridge. To your left is one of the most beautiful powder rooms designed in new development.
The long gallery allows the opportunity for art, and leads you to an open living and dining area featuring corner views, floor to ceiling windows, 11 foot ceilings and a large balcony. With triple exposures of South, East and West, there are magnificent views throughout the apartment of iconic Manhattan Landmarks including the Chrysler Building, Williamsburg Bridge, Freedom Tower, and the Hudson River.
The Herzog & de Meuron custom interiors left no detail unattended. The kitchen is outfitted with a sculptural floating Absolute Black Granite kitchen island, Corian counter tops, with modern, yet elegant finishes. Enjoy top of the line appliances from Sub-Zero and Miele, including a washer and dryer.
The large master bedroom has beautiful views of the Hudson River and features two expansive walk in closets. The ensuite master bath greets you with travertine and radiant heated floors and leads you to a windowed modern spa-like experience never before seen with a sleek soaking tub and separate shower. Enjoy picturesque sunsets from a terraced guest bedroom or study with its own full ensuite bathroom.
The residence features a 4-pipe heating and cooling system for year round multi-zone climate control. 56 Leonard has already solidified itself as a modern masterpiece, and the jewel of lower Manhattan. Designed by the iconic Herzog & Meuron 56 Leonard soars high above prime Tribeca.
56 Leonard provides an exclusive lifestyle with 17,000 sq. feet of amenities including fitness center, yoga studio, treatment rooms, steam room and sauna, a library lounge, private dining/conference room with a catering kitchen, theater, children's play room, Sky Estuary, and 75-foot infinity-edge lap pool with a landscaped outdoor sundeck and soaking spa. 56 Leonard has quickly become a New York City staple, 30B-east is the perfect opportunity to be a part of this exclusive residence.

This one-of-a-kind 3,397 SF, 3 bedroom, 3.5 bath duplex residence features a beautiful private terrace and stunning north and west views of the river and Downtown skyline through 10' floor to ceiling windows. A private elevator vestibule leads to a breathtaking corner great room with an eat-in kitchen and dining area ideal for entertaining and daily living. The corner great room overlooks a spectacular 2,200 SF terrace with 25' saltwater pool and outdoor shower. The second floor is home to a sophisticated master bedroom suite that offers a large walk in closet and floor to ceiling windows facing west allowing for stunning sunsets and light. The windowed 5-fixture master bathroom features an elongated custom white oak vanity with integrated double sinks, Muse by Kos deep soaking tub, separate oversized shower, private water closet and radiant heated floors. The gracious and well-proportioned second and third bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms and large closet systems.This exceptional home is also complete with a high capacity washer, vented dryer, and a multi-zoned heating and cooling system. 565 Broome Soho is designed by award winning architect, Renzo Piano. Backed by his team at Renzo Piano Building Workshop, he recently designed The Whitney Museum of American Art in New York City in addition to designing many of the world's most recognized and celebrated properties. 565 Broome Soho will be Renzo Piano's first residential building in New York City. Our location in highly sought after Soho mixes the best of restaurants, high end luxury retailers and neighborhood services that are part of day to day life. 565 Broome Soho is in very close proximity to Hudson River Park with many recreational opportunities including biking and jogging paths and playgrounds. Renzo Piano has created a 30 story building with 115 residences, the building standing 290 feet makes it the tallest residential building in Soho. The façade, curtain wall, is comprised of low iron extra wide glass which is almost like crystal and allows for optimal clarity. There are no harsh corners in the design of 565 Broome Soho - the corners are rounded using non-segmented glass which can give the resident the feeling of floating over Manhattan.Amenities include a spacious lobby designed by Renzo Piano with a 24-hour concierge and attended lobby with double height glass that allows for plenty of natural light. Other amenities include a private gated driveway and a porte cochere that is beautifully planted and landscaped, a 55-foot indoor swimming pool on the 9th floor with men's and women's sauna and steam. Off of the 9th floor the building has a 1200 SF landscaped sunning terrace. On the 7th floor there is a fitness center, yoga/stretching room and a children's playroom. A stunning conservatory/curated library for residents only has 92' ceilings, a live wall with growth lighting as well as ambient lighting plus a social room, media room and a caterer's kitchen. The building also has automated parking for purchase.

Our location in highly sought after Soho mixes the best of restaurants, high end luxury retailers and neighborhood services that are part of day to day life. 565 Broome Soho is in very close proximity to Hudson River Park with many recreational opportunities including biking and jogging paths and playgrounds. Renzo Piano has created a 30 story building with 115 residences, the building standing 290 feet makes it the tallest residential building in Soho. The façade, curtain wall, is comprised of low iron extra wide glass which is almost like crystal and allows for optimal clarity. There are no harsh corners in the design of 565 Broome Soho - the corners are rounded using non-segmented glass which can give the resident the feeling of floating over Manhattan.Amenities include a spacious lobby designed by Renzo Piano with a 24-hour concierge and attended lobby with double height glass that allows for plenty of natural light. Other amenities include a private gated driveway and a porte cochere that is beautifully planted and landscaped, a 55-foot indoor swimming pool on the 9th floor with men's and women's sauna and steam. Off of the 9th floor the building has a 1200 SF landscaped sunning terrace. On the 7th floor there is a fitness center, yoga/stretching room and a children's playroom. A stunning conservatory/curated library for residents only has 92' ceilings, a live wall with growth lighting as well as ambient lighting plus a social room, media room and a caterer's kitchen. The building also has automated parking for purchase.

Easily convertible to a 3 bedroom, this spacious duplex condo in a relaxed elevator building on the Prospect Heights/Crown Heights border has all the space you need. With over 1300 sq ft this smartly configured space has two nicely sized bedrooms, an open lounge/play space, and a half bath on the parlor floor; downstairs there's a large living space, kitchen, and full bath. A door to the common hallway provides easy access to the building's storage rooms, laundry and common garden. There's room for your imagination here: the ample floorpan lends itself to many potential configurations. Introducing 64 East, an exclusive boutique collection of six full-floor residences with private outdoor terraces situated in the nexus of the Bowery District. 64 East offers a cutting edge design philosophy that is applied with the first smartphone based video technology within the heart of one the most thriving neighborhoods of downtown New York City. 64 East epitomizes both the history and perpetually changing landscape that is New York, reflecting the heritage of this iconic thoroughfare in a forward, modern design.

These floor through, 1,807 square-foot lofts offer two bedrooms and a home office/convertible third bedroom, with two bathrooms plus powder room. The layouts provide a well thought-out sophisticated floor plan with keyed elevator entrance directly into the residence. The sprawling and dramatic great room, just over 23' x 23' of living space is set apart by deep set, floor-to-ceiling casement windows that elevate and cement the quality of these lofts. These are light-filled homes with contemporary details that illuminate downtown living. One's own private terrace provides a welcome reprieve. With its open-plan living, kitchen and dining concept, window walls that allow abundant natural light to pour in, and ceiling heights maximized by revealing the structural beams, the interiors of 64 East are defined by polished materials, expansiveness and natural light.

Designed for ease and entertaining, 64 East offers sleek kitchens that are comprised of Stevali European-style cabinetry, a Pental quartz countertop accented by an Artistic Tile backslash, with a Wolf 30 inch Dual-Fuel Range, Sub-Zero 36 inch bottom mount refrigerator, Sharp 24 inch microwave drawer and a Bosch 24 inch dishwasher. Bathrooms at 64 East are an inviting haven for clean simplicity and surprising dimension, with classic design elements like subway tiles, floating cabinetry, and gleaming, all-nickel plumbing hardware with cross handles and escutcheon plates from Waterworks' distinctive Ludlow collection.

Resident amenities include in-residence vented washer and dryer, a Virtual Doorman by ButterflyMX offering secure smartphone based video technology that allow residents to monitor guests and deliveries from their own handled device, and an on-site fitness center with an entertainment system and equipment by Gym Source.

Gorgeous two bedroom, 1 bath located in the heart of Woodside! This residence has pre-war charm with an excellent layout, oversized windows and great closet space. Rare, sensational corner loft in Soho's sought-after Historic Cast Iron District. Impeccably architect-designed & flooded with natural light, beaming in from 16 oversized windows on 3 exposures! PRICE REDUCTION: Sponsor Pays Transfer Taxes. THE BARNARD: Boutique building located in Hip and Historic Hamilton Heights. A brand new development in one of Hamilton Heights most iconic and beloved buildings. The stunning circular facade of the historic Barnard hearkens back to the Victorian days when it was an elite gentleman's club and later, when it was an equally elite Boy's school. Live in a remarkable piece of history with all the modern luxuries. This boutique condo development offers 4 units, one per floor. Every unit has two bedrooms, two bathrooms, elegant high end fixtures and appliances, laundry rooms, walk-in closets. Have it all with a large bedroom, gorgeous en-suite master marble bath with a claw footed tub, rain shower and two separate sinks. The equally chic second bath gleams with intricate tile work. Stunning floors throughout and more windows, windows and windows, on three sides. The open living room / kitchen is flooded with natural light from windows which flank the lovely round shape. The richness of the floors, wood and stone work of each unit respects the beauty of the building and its storied history. Near a vital commercial zone and one block from the A,B,C,D trains. Central air. Lovely and unique, a landmark in Hamilton Heights.

STUNNING DESIGNER LOFT
As you approach the ornate sandstone and brick facade of Bleecker Tower with its iconic copper tower, it is already apparent that that this building is anything but ordinary. Built in the late 19th Century to house the Manhattan Savings Institution, this magnificent, monumental building was the site of one of the greatest bank heists of all time by George Leslie, the "King of the Bank Robbers?" and his band of thieves, solidifying a place in NYC lore.

Today, this legendary building has been transformed into a boutique and exclusive cooperative in the heart of NoHo with apartments that echo the grandeur of the building itself. Apartment 2E is perhaps the crown jewel of the building, benefitting from the dramatic, floor-to-ceiling arched windows that encircle the building's 2nd floor with approximately 12 ½ -foot ceilings. The colossal scale of the windows emphasizes the expanse of the loft space while simultaneously articulating the vast living room into more intimate areas with no shortage of uses.

With an incredible, open chef's kitchen featuring top of the line stainless steel appliances, including 2 ovens, 2 Fisher & Paykel dishwashers, 2 refrigerators as well as a wine refrigerator, this is a home designed for entertainment and has the capacity to cater elegant dinner or cocktail parties on an impressive scale. The hardwood cabinetry, gorgeous marble counters and center island, as well as the sophisticated finishes make this the perfect blend of beauty and functionality.

The serene master suite showcases a custom dressing room and magnificent, sparkling master bath with radiant heat marble floors, elegant Maestro Picasso soaking tub, decorative wrought iron staircase, standing shower with exquisite mosaic tile and Dorn Bracht fixtures, and La Cava double vanity.

A handsome library lined with bookshelves also features an adjoining media room and is adjacent to a fully renovated 2nd full bathroom. Complete with automated Lutron lighting and muti-zoned Sonos surround sound, new luxurious hardwood floors throughout, this trophy home also includes a powder room and washer/dryer.

This stunning home was reimagined by award-winning interior designer, Nina Serafi. Bleecker Tower features a part-time doorman, beautiful landscaped roofdeck and private storage bins. Located in the heart of NoHo, enjoy fine dining at Balthazar, BondST and Mercer Kitchen, as well as all neighborhood amenities, including Equinox, Soul Cycle, The Bowery Hotel, Crosby Street Hotel, designer shopping and so much more.

SoHo, NoHo, the Lower East Side and Little Italy.

SoHo, NoHo, the Lower East Side and Little Italy.

Located on one of the most coveted blocks downtown, situated in the epicenter of prime Nolita, and offering chic boutique eateries, all right in the nexus of Downtown Manhattan. Perfectly located on one of the most desirable blocks in prime Greenwich Village, the fourth floor at 82 University Condominium will welcome its new owner home with a carefully designed layout, top-of-the-line finishes and abundant natural light.

Enter into the residence via the key-locked elevator to be greeted immediately by strong natural light from three eastern-facing windows. The living area, overlooking University Place, enjoys a comfortable size, ample storage, a separate home office area, and a Juliette balcony. Flowing into the living space is an open plan Poggenpohl kitchen with Viking appliances and an overhung counter for dining stools.

Across the residence on the western side are two king-sized bedrooms, each with access to a rear balcony overlooking tranquil gardens. The second bedroom has access to a full bath also used for guests, while the master boasts two closets, one a walk-in, and a large, four-piece master bathroom with rain shower and soaking tub.

The current owner has significantly upgraded the residence adding split-system central air, custom closet built-ins, and custom lighting. A washer and dryer in the residence tops off this stunning, move-in ready Greenwich Village home.

82 University Place is a private, boutique condominium of six floor-through residences plus the penthouse in downtown's most sought-after neighborhood. There is bike storage in the basement for all unit owners at no extra cost.

Transportation does not get any easier with access to the MTA. The 4, 5, 6, N, R, W, Q and L trains are a 3 minute walk to Union Square while the F and V are a 5 minute walk. For dog and park lovers, you are steps from Union Square and Washington Square Park. For the foodies, you have Whole foods, Agata and Valentine to get groceries as well as some of the top restaurants close by like Babbo, Blue Hill, Nix, Shuko, Casa Mono, Ippudo, Union Square Cafe, Corkbuzz Wine Studio, Babu Ji, Loring Place, Tim Ho Wan and ABC Kitchen.

Low monthlies make this home attractive to any new owner or investor. With ability to be rented quickly and at a high price on a quickly appreciating block, investors should take note! Being that 82 University Place is a condominium all buyer profiles are welcome!

Set on an ample .80 acre is this 4 bedroom, 3 bath one-level Contemporary home that is conveniently located only minutes to the village and ocean beaches. Must see this completely Renovated Detached Frame Colonial With great Curb Appeal and too many Upgrades To List. This home will not last long on the market.

Now Available - Apt. 14C at 910 Fifth Avenue is an extraordinary home in one of New York's premier buildings. Developed by Fred French in 1920, the Italian Renaissance style of 910 Fifth Avenue has a recognized pedigree that sets it apart. From the minute you reach the 14th floor of the private elevator landing, you realize that your time for imagining your perfect lifestyle is over and the dream of a beautiful new beginning has now become your reality.

The luxurious interior living space framed with lush outdoor space is the perfect setting for a lifestyle suited to both private enjoyment and grand style entertainment.Exposures NESW offer majestic views of iconic Central Park and the chiseled architecture of New York City. One of the terraces is a 25 x 40 foot sculpture terrace which is professionally designed, landscaped, irrigated, and lit- the perfect respite from busy city life, or your own "best place in town" for an evening under the stars. The terraces overlooking East 71 Street and east to Madison Avenue reveal a cityscape from your vantage point that is highly sought after. The zoned and timed, dripped irrigation system was hand designed for all the flowering shrubs and trees.

The floor plan is designed to flow gracefully from the expansive living room to the spacious dining room and into a whimsical breakfast room crowned with a well- designed skylight. The wet bar and the sky lit music room complete the splendid entertaining space with a wall of windows that reveal the sculpture terrace. The whisper quiet Fugitsu split air conditioning units are zoned in each room. The compressors are on the terrace. The hard wired telephone system accommodates five telephone numbers and paging at 15 locations throughout the apartment.

The staff room with private laundry facility is adjacent to the spacious kitchen.Four bedrooms, three full baths, and two half baths, incredible closet space, and wall space for art, create a living environment that is tranquil, efficient, elegant, and private.

910 Fifth Avenue is a full service 16 story building having a parking garage with a special rate for shareholders, a gym, and a ready, discreet staff of 24 hour doormen and lobby attendants. There are no summer work rules and pieds-à-terre are permitted. Sorry, no pets. 2% flip tax by the buyer.

Colonial With Four (4) Bedrooms In Williston Park. Brand New Kitchen With Ss Appliances. Gas Heat And Cooking. Newly Finished Very Large Open Basement With A Side Entrance. Large Brick Paved Driveway . Very Close To The Lirr. Hardwood Floors. Throughout

Welcome to this grand Bay Ridge home in one of the most sought after buildings in the area.

Upon entering this beautiful home you are greeted by a formal dining room that easily holds a table for eight for all your entertaining needs. The apartment also comes with two king-sized bedrooms, each with two closets and the master bedroom has an en suite bathroom. In total the apartment has six closets, seventeen windows, and has four exposures to maximize air flow and ventilation.

This elegant 12-room apartment boasts graceful pre-war proportions, generous ten-foot ceilings and large windows throughout. A total of five rooms, or ninety linear feet, front Park Avenue. The secondary suite faces east with water views.

The enormous master wing, also facing fully east with floor-to-ceiling glass, enjoys dual walk-in closets, a spa-like five piece master bath, and enough space to fit a large, king sized bed as well as ample other furniture.

This enormous & sun-drenched corner condo boasts 10 foot ceilings and floor to ceiling windows throughout. Featuring a sought after split 2 bedroom layout with 2 full baths and private terrace, this apartment boasts amazing city views, spacious living/dining room, and wide plank oak flooring throughout. The Master Suite has a large walk in closet, bathroom with double sinks. This luxurious unit also comes complete with an open kitchen featuring imported Italian cabinetry, Dornbracht fixtures, Sub- Zero and Bosch appliances, washer/dryer in unit.The seemingly endless building services and amenities start with a landscaped circular driveway with Porte Cochere, an attended parking garage, full time doorman and concierge, private storage, bicycle room, and cold storage for fresh food deliveries.The spa at ELEMENT features a 60' 3-lane lap pool, children's pool, whirlpool, massage and treatment room, saunas, fitness center, Yoga/Pilates studio, and indoor basketball and squash courts. Element has approximately 12,000 SF of outdoor space including its own great lawn, social lounge and sundeck. The children's playroom with adjoining outdoor playground is outfitted with toys and accessories from FAO Schwarz, weekly classes are hosted by Jodi's Gym. The resident lounge at ELEMENT features intimate seating areas, billiards table, flat screen TV, and kitchen area.

Two bedroom, two bathroom home with South facing floor to ceiling windows. Spacious windowed kitchen with high gloss lacquer cabinets, subzero fridge and wine fridge, Bosch cook top and dishwasher. The kitchen opens to the living room which gets beautiful south and east light. Both bedrooms are spacious with customized closets and the master having a large custom fitted walk in closet and a large en suite bathroom with double vanity, deep soaking tub and a separate shower. A washer and dryer and hardwood floors complete this turn key home.The element is steps from the highly anticipated Riverside south, time Warner center and many parks. The Element features an on site garage (separate fee), a state of the art fitness center, Children's playroom, lounge/game room, outdoor patio, swimming pool, basketball and squash court, and a live-in super.

One bedroom apartment, hardwood floors and lots of closet space. Heat and hot water included.Subway R on 86th, Shopping and restaurants on 5th ave and 3th ave, Parks,Available September 15. pets allowed, dogs under 35 pounds.Showing by appointment only Monday and Tuesday 4:00-7:00pm

RARE OPPORTUNITY to rent a Shigeru Ban Duplex loft at Metal Shutter Houses!

ENTERTANING LEVEL: Gracious living room featuring 20ft ceilings with two incredible upwardly pivoting glass walls that completely open up to the large South facing terrace for universal living. Custom Shigeru Ban kitchen features white matte lacquer cabinetry and top of the line chef's appliances. Library/media room with North facing loggia / balcony with Shigeru Ban designed perforated metal shutters and Empire State Building views. A bedroom with full en suite bathroom featuring Bianco Dolomiti marble and Shigeru Ban vanity completes this floor.

UPPER LEVEL: North facing master bedroom with an en suite Shigeru Ban designed Japanese Spa bathroom featuring a deep soaking tub, glass enclosed stall shower and Bianco Dolomiti marble complemented by a massive dressing area. In addition, there is a second bedroom with ample closet space and custom en suite bathroom. A sunny built in workspace overlooking your one of kind glass retractable walls is smartly designed for a bright home office.

DETAILS: Key locked elevator opens on each level. 20ft - 10ft ceilings. White oak flooring throughout. Central AC and heating. Washer/dryer in unit.

Spectacular in every way, this 3,347 sq ft modern masterpiece loft at coveted 52 Lispenard in Tribeca is soaked in sunshine and impeccably designed from top to bottom. Direct key-locked elevator access leads into a gracious entry gallery that introduces an awe-inspiring ambience of museum-quality elegance with 4 bedrooms and 4.5 baths. The magnificent great room stretching nearly 51' wide showcases full-frontage window views of historic Lispenard Street that extend to the Chrysler Building, creating a wonderful backdrop for entertaining. A marble-wrapped smokeless clean-burning fireplace centers the spacious living area, which spills into the open dining room and stunning custom chef's kitchen styled with Bianco Borealis marble, top-of-the-line Gaggenau and Miele appliances, a U-Line under-counter wine cooler, Franke garbage disposal and Falmec vented range hood. The apartment is awash with natural light pouring in from custom oversized wood-frame windows and 45' of lovely skylights. Rich 8?-wide Italian white oak plank flooring flows throughout the grand space, complemented by recessed Kreon LED art lighting which adds a contemporary touch. Generously-sized bedrooms offer plentiful closet space, particularly the indulgent master suite with a huge walk-in. The ultra-luxe Calacatta Italian marble master bath boasts radiant heat floors, custom double-sink vanity, CEA Design faucets and accessories, deep soaking Zuma tub, glass-enclosed Thermasol steam shower and water closet with wall-mounted Duravit toilet. A large south-facing balcony off one of the bedrooms provides a peaceful outdoor escape. Secondary baths dressed in gorgeous Silk Georgette Limestone tile by Salvatori feature custom vanities with waved Corian sinks and deep soaking Zuma tubs. Other highlights of this special home include a full laundry room with GE washer and vented dryer, stainless steel sink and custom storage, 4-zone Mitsubishi heating/cooling system, auxiliary radiant heat by Runtal, smart home prewiring for complete control of audio/video, lighting, window treatments and HVAC. A new boutique condominium with a part-time doorman and video intercom, 52 Lispenard sits in the heart of TriBeCa at the crossroads of Chinatown and the Financial District, near premier restaurants, designer shops and major train lines

Available now! Furnished or Unfurnished! You Decide! !Now is your chance to come home to your beautiful alcove studio in super trendy Clinton! The apartment features Stainless Steel Appliances, Granite Countertops and hard wood imported cabinets. The bathroom is new and features heated floors! The building features a state of the art fitness center, a wonderfully appointed resident lounge and graciously landscaped out door area. There is 24 hour concierge and doorman assistance as well as a resident super in case of any emergency. Don't delay this is your chance to live in your own private urban oasis!

Authentic full floor approximately 1800 square foot Loft offering over 11 foot ceilings and large windows allowing for excellent natural light through double exposures in the heart of SoHo between Spring and Broome. Semi-separate kitchen dishwasher and in-home washer/dryer. This exciting neighborhood location is home to great shopping, restaurants, entertainment with easy access to all train lines.

This stunning 1-bedroom, 1-bathroom apartment has an abundance of natural light that comes through the oversized windows. The 10ft ceilings amplify the already spacious and airy feel to this home. The living room and master bedroom overlook the charming brownstones on Renwick Street. The gourmet open kitchen features high-end stainless steel appliances, Tanzanian Anigre wood cabinetry and slate countertops. The spa-like marble bath features a cherry wood vanity and a deep Kohler soaking tub. This apartment also features an abundance of outfitted closet space, a washer/dryer and central ac. The building offers some incredible features: Aside from the aesthetically pleasing lobby there is a dedicated doorman / concierge at your service 24/7, a fitness center, playroom, pet spa, bicycle room, common Zen meditation garden/courtyard, and private storage for each apartment. This is a fantastic home and an excellent investment opportunity.This SoHo residence is located in one of the most desirable zip codes in Manhattan bordering Tribeca and the West Village. Just a short distance from the surrounding neighborhoods such as Little Italy, Noho, Greenwich Village and with Hudson River Park just minutes away. Easy access to multiple Subway lines, fine dining, unique boutiques, art galleries, city's nightlife and so much more.

Conceived by SHoP Architects, handcrafted locally in the Brooklyn Navy Yard, and assembled on top of 11 subway lines, 461 Dean Street offers an unrivaled residential experience in immediate proximity to the new Pacific Park in Brooklyn. As the tallest modular building in the world, 461 Dean Street affords spacious layouts and near limitless views of Brooklyn, Manhattan, and Queens inherently unique to its modular construction.The residences at 461 Dean Street boast floor to ceiling windows, solar shades, wide plank walnut flooring, custom closet build-outs, and washers and dryers in each unit. Kitchens are outfitted with custom cabinetry, Caesarstone countertop and stone backsplash, stainless steel GE appliances, and integrated dishwashers and microwaves. Bathrooms are appointed with white quartz stone wall panels, polished chrome Grohe and Duravit fixtures, custom walnut medicine cabinetry, and wall hung Toto toilets.The robust amenity offering at 461 Dean Street is comprised of a sky lounge and rooftop terrace, state of the art fitness center, yoga, and dance studio, residents lounge with a catering kitchen and dedicated party room, a game room with billiards and ping-pong, and a children's playroom.At the nexus of Brooklyn's most vibrant neighborhoods is Pacific Park Brooklyn. With beautiful residences designed by industry leading architects, a brand new 8-acre park, Barclays Center and dynamic neighborhood shopping and dining right in your backyard, Pacific Park has something for everyone, just steps from the 2, 3, 4, 5, B, D, N, Q, R, C, G, trains.2 Months Free and 1 Month OP on 14 Month Lease for 1 Bedrooms1 Month Free and 1 Month OP on 13 Month Lease for Studios

This TWO BEDROOM Garden Duplex has a WBFP, 1.5 Baths ,an Open kitchen and a new WALK-IN CLOSET ! The LOFTLIKE main floor is stunning ! You will enjoy living on one of the prettiest Boerum Hill blocks. So convenient to many Subways ! The PARLOR floor is lovely with just enough low key/elegant detail and so much living and wall space. A super contemporary kitchen has a big cooking island and very nice cabinetry ;it's almost new as it was recently installed. The cabinetry is sharp +will exceed your expectations ! This is a super well designed space you'll enjoy with a couple of DINING areas to choose from and office area as well ! I love this fabulous " BIG " picture window that faces the garden. BasicDetails.Description:
**NO FEE + 1 MONTH FREE LUXURY 2BR ON LIC'S WATERFRONT**

Now available is a beautifully laid out 2 Bedroom, 2 Bathroom home on LIC's waterfront with stunning views from every room. Available immediately, NO FEE, 1ST MONTH FREE, for a 1-2 year lease option.

This split bedroom apartment features an open spacious layout, condo-like finishes, oversized windows, oak wood floors, entry foyer with large coat closet, a modern kitchen with black caesarstone countertops, white lacquer cabinetry, stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, W/D in unit, ample closet space throughout, and South/West exposure with direct views of the Manhattan skyline. You will love the Master Bedroom which has large windows flooding the room with warm natural light, has 2 large closets, and a en-suite Master Bath with great storage space.

This full service luxury amenity towers is LEED-certified, pet friendly, and provides residents with the best amenities in the area. You'll have access to an amenity package consisting of 24-hour concierge, a package room, valet service, children's playroom, a high-tech fitness center, yoga room, a 50,000 square foot landscaped sun deck which includes a 2ft reflecting pool, BBQ & lounge area, beach volleyball court, 2 tennis courts, a great lawn, children's playground, a 1000-car parking garage, and retail on the ground floor. All of this located within steps from Gantry Plaza State Park. There are 3 dog parks in the area, brand new schools, 4 play grounds, and a variety of restaurants to choose from. Only 1 stop (and 5 min) on the 7 train from Grand Central. Building provides a free shuttle service to the Vernon/Jackson Ave. station in case you don't feel like walking. Also within walking distance of the E,M, & G trains.

Please contact me to schedule a private showing of this apt. I am available 7 days a week. **NO BROKER FEE. Prospective tenants will be subject to an application review and credit check through TF Cornerstone. $100/person**Gross rent is $4,255/month. Advertised rent is the net rent of $3,900, based 1st month free on a 12 month lease.

Stunning two bed two bath with full-time doorman and private washer and dryer in mint condition towering over the Meatpacking District and West Village. Spectacular views of the entire Downtown skyline including New York Harbor and the World Trade Center will inspire you from morning to night. Step into a graceful entry foyer and take in the beautiful open kitchen with integrated appliances and caesarstone counters. Your large master suite with five piece ensuite bath is the perfect place to dream. The split bedroom layout ensures maximum privacy between the master and large second bedroom. Amenities include private roof deck, resident's lounge, zen meditation garden and discounted membership to on-site Equinox Health Club. The Caledonia is the anchor of the High Line. Chelsea Market, the West Village, Morimoto, The Dream Hotel and any number of incredible restaurants, entertainment and shopping options are literally right downstairs. A simply incredible opportunity.

Luxurious Finishes - This sleek, spacious contemporary apartment is a beautiful home, flooded with southern light that baths the apt. through floor to ceiling windows. Remote control solar shades are fitted on all the windows, with additional remote blackout shades in both bedrooms. The apt. has 9.5' ceilings and hardwood floors throughout. The open gourmet kitchen is a chef's delight featuring a Sub-Zero refrigerator, Miele dishwasher, Viking oven, as well as a Marvel wine fridge, finished with terrazzo flooring, stainless steel and glass cabinetry, and polished quartzite counter top. The master bedroom offers a large custom designed walk-in California closet and an en-suite spa-like master bath with a free standing Philippe Stark soaking tub, and a separate rain shower stall, limestone floors and double sinks set in Bianco marble. There's an advanced heating and cooling system throughout the apartment, and a washer/dryer. SORRY NO PETS The Chelsea Modern is perfectly located in West Chelsea's trendy Gallery district, steps from the Highline Park, one block to the Hudson River Park and two restaurants on the block and an abundance of boutiques and lounges on the avenue, and just four blocks to the buzz of the Meat Packing district.The Chelsea Modern is 12-story, 47-residence boutique development and the winner of two architecture awards and the building features: 24-hour doorman, concierge, cold storage, bike storage, and a fitness room. A Zen garden and Roof deck

RARELY available 4 BED- 3.5 BATH, Limestone Townhouse in Bay Ridge's prestigious and Historic "Doctors Row". This classic limestone represents timeless pre-war elegance and style. It includes details such as high ceilings, original, detailed woodwork and beautifully treated original hardwood floors throughout.This exquisite home features spacious bedrooms, 3 full baths, a bear claw tub and an additional half-bath powder room off the Parlor level. Expansive sun-drenched living room with its staple Bay Windows facing out onto the serene front garden. Featuring a Library/Den room with deco fireplace, a massive eat-in kitchen with updated finishes. Intricately designed and meticulously upkept Presidential dining/family room with exquisite original woodwork, beamed ceilings, and an elegant decorative fireplace! Additional features include Central Air throughout, Sky-lights with original stained glass casings, Washer/dryer, and more.This original limestone townhouse is further accented by a beautifully landscaped front patio garden, and a serene, private backyard and garden! Tenant pays utilities.**Basement level with Private entrance floor legally permitted for Doctors office use. Available 900 sq ft windowed basement w/ high 8 ft ceilings with designated bath and small kitchenette. As an additional feature, upon Landlord final approval, Tenant may rent out the basement to a licensed Doctor and collect rent.** All the beauty, tranquility, and charming history of Brooklyn right at your door step! Bay Ridge features an array of cozy diners, spacious parks and laid-back bars. Close to 5th avenue shops, restaurants, and entertainment, this home is conveniently located around the corner from the 77th R Train Station and B4, B70, B63 bus stops. CALL/Text/Email TODAY to secure a viewing!

The building features an elevator, a virtual doorman and small gym in the basement. One or two year lease available. Schedule a showing today!

Sunny penthouse apartment waiting for you to call it home! Sun light floods the entire apartment through an 18 ft. floor to ceiling window and two skylights in the kitchen! Lovely duplex one bedroom, one bath apartment with an alcove to be used as your home office or nursery and plenty of closet space! Living room features a working wood-burning fireplace, a large balcony with city views and an open kitchen with wood cabinetry and granite finishes. Hardwood floors, skylights, and oversized windows add to this home's beautiful finishes!Elevator building with a virtual doorman/concierge, package, laundry and fitness rooms.

Perched high above the beautiful waterfront Gantry Plaza State Park, this is a unique opportunity to experience all that Long Island City (LIC) has to offer from this expansive Four-bedroom, Three-bathroom home. With amazing sunset views of the famed New York City skyline & East River, every day you can watch the city that never sleeps come alive right in front of your eyes.

Conveniently located only one stop on the 7-train from Grand Central, this spacious residence boast tons of amazing features that make it exceptionally unique and one-of-a-kind. Triple exposures north, south, and west bathe the home in natural sunlight from morning to night. With over 2,000 square feet of living space, 2 private terraces, a new modern kitchen featuring top-of-the-line appliances such as a Sub-Zero refrigerator, Dacor gas stove, and Miele dishwasher, this property has everything.

From the moment you enter the main living space (26-foot by 29-foot), you'll be dreaming of the magical moment when you have all your closest friends over to watch the epic fireworks display that takes places just outside your windows on the 4th of July. The wall-to-wall windows create an expansive view and frame the Manhattan skyline. The high ceilings and rich Armstrong grey stone floors are a lovely feature that elevates this property.

The ultra-modern pass-through kitchen creates a beautiful pop of color with its European red cabinets and rose granite floors and countertops, while the home's bedroom layout takes full advantage of the units 3 exposures. Each room offers equally stunning views of the New York City skyline, as well as ample closet space and artfully crafted en-suite bathrooms, featuring unique tile work. The master bath has a six-foot Jacuzzi tub to soak in after a long day of work. Two of the bedrooms have private terrace access that provides breathtaking North and South views. A fourth room can serve as an additional bedroom or home office. In New York City, storage is a premium. This apartment solves that problem by offering tons of closet space and built-ins throughout the entire home.

Citylights is a 42-story building with 522 units designed by Argentine-American architect Cesar Pelli. Residents are rewarded with stunning, unobstructed views of the NYC skyline, as well as a lengthy list of amenities including a 24-hr doorman, concierge, five-story garage, high-tech fitness center, sauna, two tennis courts, and a landscaped rooftop.

Long Island City is currently the fastest growing city in the US, making it one of the most sought-after neighborhoods, not only in New York City but the world. Around every corner, there are hidden gems just waiting to be discovered. From unique restaurants, cafés, shopping, waterfront parks, dog runs, bowling, trivia nights, yoga, Crossfit, rock climbing, art studios, children's playgrounds, and community events, Long Island City has it all, while still maintaining a certain "neighborhood" charm that sets it apart from other areas in NYC.

Having access to both the nearby 7 train and 2 ferry stops provides multiple options for your commute. The convenience of having so many transportation options means that you'll find yourself arriving places earlier than your friends who live in Manhattan. You can be in the city in less than 5 minutes and to Wall Street in 25 minutes.

Please contact me to set up a private viewing.

This spacious two-bedroom/one-bathroom apartment is located in the residential Washington Heights neighborhood. Nestled on a quiet tree-lined block, the apartment has shiny hardwood floors and high ceilings throughout. Upon entrance is a large foyer, which connects the dining room, living room and kitchen. The apartment has several large windows that boast plenty of natural sun exposure. The kitchen has stainless steel appliances, granite countertops, hickory cabinets and cupboards and a deep sink. There is a glass pass through French door in the kitchen as well. Air conditioners are in every room. A hallway connects both king-sized bedrooms. Both bedrooms have double closets for plenty of storage space. The bathroom has a sliding glass tub door; as well as white fixtures and vertical shower. This building offers video intercoms in all units for safety and a live in super. Building amenities include elevator, laundry room, bike room, storage room, outdoor backyard space/vegetable garden, and 24 hour video surveillance cameras throughout. There is a parking garage on the corner for a nominal fee. Only one block away from both the 1 and A trains. This apartment is the perfect charming and cozy place to call home.

Beautiful 2 bedroom apartment newly renovated. The apartment in total is 6 rooms, 2 sizable bedrooms, living room and a dining room. The bathroom has been gut renovated and the kitchen has new cabinets and new appliances, including a dishwasher. Kitchen opens up to a balcony. Great outdoor space perfect for entertaining guests. Plenty of closets and a good amount of storage space. Refinished hardwood floors. ½ block from the laundromat on Skillman Avenue. Tons of variety of restaurants and bars. Close to Sunnyside Gardens. 2 1/2 blocks from 46th Street 7 train subway station. 20 minutes straight to Manhattan. 5 minutes to Queensboro Plaza where the N, Q, W, E, M & R trains intersect. This apartment is located in the heart of Sunnyside. Farmers market is held on Skillman Avenue just 3 blocks away every Saturday. The building itself is a multi-family home with two units, the first floor is already rented. Pets are welcome and it is case by case.

Stunning and stylish loft in PRIME Fashion District location. Featuring soaring 14-foot ceilings, this loft apartment features a modern kitchen and bath, new floors and (almost) floor to ceiling windows. The main level has plenty of room for a living and dining area and is perfect for entertaining while watching the parades march down Fifth Avenue. There is also a LARGE closet on the main level. Straight stairs lead you to the bedroom area, which has a height clearance of approximately 6 feet and has enough square footage to support a full KING BR set. There is also a closet in the loft area. 372 Fifth Avenue is a full-service building with a full-time doorman, live-in super, multi-floor laundry, and a fantastic roof deck with PRIME Empire State Views. Pets OK!
